channel.title: Friv on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Friv on Game6r

item.title: 1001 Arabian Nights 3
item.description: The majestic Amazon River is gradually shallowing and you have to save one of its tributaries. During a scientific expedition, you managed to discover an ancient device created by the scientists of the Inca tribe and capable of cleaning the river. Try with the help of magic balls to free the river from the mule that blocked the flow of water.

item.title: 3 Pandas In Japan
item.description: A huge city is captured by a gang of criminals. Bandits are terrorizing the local population, and the police and military are not able to restore order on the streets of the metropolis. Only the brave heroes of the animated series “Yu Yu Hakushi” are able to stop the villains. Choose one of the heroes of the anime team and join the battle. Try to destroy all the bandits and free the civilians of the metropolis.

item.title: Adam And Eve
item.description: The fascinating game Adam and Eve takes you to the prehistoric world and offers to help the caveman in his difficult journey. On his way there are many dangers, and you need to overcome them all, using the items available on the locations. Just click on them in the correct order to clear the way. If you suddenly make a mistake and click in the wrong place, nothing will happen.

item.title: Adam And Eve 2
item.description: Play Adam and Eve 2 invites all lovers of travel and puzzles. In the game you have to help the first person on Earth to reach the goal. The character is waiting for a huge number of locations, each of which has a puzzle encrypted. It is necessary to solve it in order to clear the way for Adam. To do this, click on the items in a certain sequence to get rid of the obstacle.

item.title: Adam And Eve 3
item.description: Play Adam and Eve 3 invites all lovers of quests. In this game you have to help a caveman who went in search of his beloved. The task is to free his path from obstacles and dangers. To do this, use the items presented at each location. Just click on them to get the desired result in the end. If you suddenly click in the wrong place, it’s not scary - just nothing will happen.

item.title: Adam And Eve 4
item.description: The game Adam and Eve 4 invites everyone to play. Here you will find a couple in love who decided to cook a delicious soup. But for this you need to get all the planned ingredients. Such an important task rests with Adam. At the beginning of the passage, he is suspended on ropes, and you need to cut them in such a way that the character moves in the right direction and, as a result, rolls over to Eve.

item.title: Adam And Eve 5 Part 1
item.description: While playing Adam and Eve 5 you will find yourself in a prehistoric world full of unexpected dangers. Here it is better to play together, using both characters at once - a couple of cavemen. They differ in height, which has a great effect on their abilities. For example, a tall hero can help a small one climb up. And the kid will easily ride to hard-to-reach places where the giant will definitely not be able to get.

item.title: Adam and Eve 5 Part 2
item.description: According to the terms of the game The Adventures of Adam and Eve, you have to control a primitive man who went on a date with his beloved. But there are many surprises along the way. It is necessary to overcome the obstacle course, where Adam will have to meet many different animals, fruits, dinosaurs and outlandish birds. To pass all the obstacles during the game Adam’s Adventure you need to think logically and guess what action should be performed next.

item.title: Adam And Eve Adam The Ghost
item.description: Adam’s New Adventures game invites you to solve several logic puzzles to help the primitive man meet his beloved. You need to go through a path full of dangers, traps and encounters with wild animals. Use the mouse to perform all the necessary actions and remember - Adam’s life is in your hands.

item.title: Adam And Eve Golf
item.description: Logic games for two offer to play the famous gallows in everything. The screen will display a diagram of the hidden word, from which it is clear how many letters it contains. Also in the game for two you will see the alphabet. Click on those letters that, in your opinion, are in the hidden word. If you correctly point to the letter, it will immediately appear in the word-scheme.

item.title: Adam And Eve Love Quest
item.description: The essence of the game Adventures of Adam 5 is that the hero will have to get into paradise and give his beloved a flower. However, on the way of a young and outwardly funny lover, many obstacles lie in wait. He will have to bypass bloodthirsty monsters and use his ingenuity to get out of numerous difficult situations with honor.

item.title: Adam and Eve Sleepwalker
item.description: The events unfolding during the game the adventures of Adam 4 will take you to the Stone Age. Embark on an incredible journey with the very first man on Earth. You have to ride bungee, move heavy boulders and make your way through dark caves. And all this in order to get to the Egyptian princess and confess her love.

item.title: Adam And Eve Zombies
item.description: The process of the game for children 8 years old Boys is associated with multi-colored magnets. A huge number of them will be displayed on the screen, and you need to rotate the magnets, trying to create combinations of three or more identical elements. Such combinations disappear, and new parts descend in their place from above. The game consists of a large number of levels.

item.title: After Burner
item.description: Airplanes for kids game will make you feel like a pilot performing a responsible combat mission. It is necessary not only to destroy enemy planes and equipment, but also to collect all the bonuses in flight. In addition, you need to overcome several difficult obstacles in the form of air corridors, flying through them without hitting a single wall.

item.title: Agent Curiosa Rouge Robots
item.description: Some might say that robot games for girls are not a good fit. However, there are exceptions to any rule. Not only are the female characters of iron, so to speak, but they also compete on the dance floor. True, they try not so much to dance each other as to shandarakht in the head with a CD.

item.title: Air Force Shooter Sky Strike
item.description: Galaxy

item.title: Airplane Fight
item.description: The Airplane Simulator game consists of three separate levels in which you will have to sit at the controls of different models of cars. The first mission is to control a small sports monoplane. Your task is to land the car in the right place. Starting to play the second mission, you will find yourself in the cockpit of a modern passenger liner, which is quite difficult to manage. In the process of playing about aircraft simulators, the most important thing is not to lose control of a huge machine.

item.title: Airplane Memory
item.description: According to the rules of the Airplane Control game, you have to become a carrier-based fighter pilot. Take off from an aircraft carrier and try to destroy all enemy targets indicated on the radar. But you must not only effectively attack the enemy, but also be able to masterfully dodge enemy missiles, otherwise you will not be able to fulfill the order.

item.title: Airplanes Puzzle
item.description: Airplane 94 game will give you the opportunity to fly a paper model of an airplane. But you need to try to make it so that it flies as far as possible. At the first levels, you will have to earn money to further improve the glider. Then you can purchase wind turbines that will increase its flight range by 94 percent.

item.title: Alien Town
item.description: An insidious villain has created a small black hole that sucks in cute aliens. To save the inhabitants of the planet, you need to seat them in rescue capsules. Try to match the aliens so that the sum of the numbers on their backs matches the numbers indicated on the teleporter, otherwise they will remain on the planet and be swallowed up by the black hole.

item.title: American Cars Jigsaw
item.description: The rules of the game Puzzles for children 6 7 years old are very simple. You need to assemble a picture from a large number of separate fragments. Pick a place for each part of the puzzle, and if something doesn’t work out, use the hint. It can be called by pressing a special button at the top of the playing field.

item.title: Amigo Pancho 2 New York Party
item.description: A very interesting game where you have to think a little to correctly draw a flight path for a paper airplane. True, this must be done in such a way that the pilot, flying along the chosen path, collects all the golden stars. Use the mouse to try to choose the best route option and go to the next level.

item.title: Angela Tom Baby Feeding
item.description: With the advent of a baby in the family, Angela and Tom have added trouble. The child wakes up almost every night and starts crying. Today you have to help young parents feed their baby. Take the kitten and wrap it in a blanket so Angela can hold it comfortably. Then give your baby a bottle of milk. He eats and stops crying.

item.title: Angela Trip Accident
item.description: Angelica the Cat game will turn you into a doctor. The cat was rollerblading, but suddenly lost her balance and fell. Because of the fall, she received many different injuries, and now the heroine of the game needs qualified medical care. In the game for girls, you will see a variety of tools that you need to use according to the tips to fix Angela’s health situation. Instructions are displayed at the top of the screen, and all items needed for healing are located at the bottom.

item.title: Angelic Charm Princess
item.description: After launching the game Angel and Demon Barbershop 3, you will find yourself in an unusual beauty salon, where you will manage an imp hairdresser who wants to create hairstyles in his own, very specific style. But this can only be done when the angel is busy with extraneous matters and does not see what is happening in the salon.

item.title: Angry Cat Shot
item.description: Evil aliens have attacked the planet of wild cats. You have to become one of the warriors of the guard of the cat queen, who needs to transport members of the royal family to a safe place. Try to demonstrate your best qualities, break through the defensive ranks of the aliens and deliver the royalty to their destination.

item.title: Angry Ducks
item.description: Children’s games for boys Balls can easily captivate for one hour and not only children. The gameplay is a kind of Tetris. Shooting multi-colored birds, you need to try to make it so that you get clusters of elements of the same color from three or more pieces. In this case, they will “burn out”.

item.title: Angry Zombies
item.description: Grandfather Nikifor lived quietly in his farm and did not know grief until he accidentally met a terrible zombie in the forest. Grandfather was not a timid ten, but still decided to leave on a tractor from his farm to a distant city. Unfortunately, the iron horse has long been broken. Help the brave old man fight off the attacks of the bloodthirsty dead and collect the parts needed to fix the tractor.

item.title: Apple Shooter Remastered
item.description: With the help of the game Shooting people with archery, the gamer will have to become a super accurate shooter performing dangerous stunts for a while. Before you stands a girl with a red apple on her head. You need to aim well and make a well-aimed shot that will bring down the fruit. But be careful, any mistake will lead to the death of a person. You will choose the shooting parameters with the mouse, focusing on the scale at the top of the screen.

item.title: Archery Training
item.description: Almost every boy’s first weapon was a homemade bow. Today you have to test your accuracy in shooting from this ancient device. You have to take into account all the little things that are important for a successful shot. After all, even a breath of wind or a falling leaf can prevent you from hitting the target.

item.title: Ariels Cake Shop
item.description: Papa Louie opens a new original cafe where everyone can try wonderful cupcakes with air cream. A famous chef invites you to become an employee of this establishment. Try to serve as many customers as possible by treating them with cupcakes prepared according to the recipe of the famous chef.

item.title: Armour Clash
item.description: An excellent 3D Ww3 tank game in which you will drive a very maneuverable and well-armed armored vehicle. Use mouse to aim, left click to fire. Enemy vehicles will show up on your radar. Use the number keys to switch between available weapons.

item.title: Arty Mouse & Friends Coloring Book
item.description: In the English city of Birmingham, where the engine Thomas and his friends live and work, a holiday will take place in a few days. The mayor of the city asked his friends to help him prepare for the upcoming celebration. Help Thomas, Bert and Harold complete important tasks as quickly as possible, because the inhabitants of the city are looking forward to this wonderful event.

item.title: Arty Mouse & Friends Learn ABC
item.description: The ABC game will appeal to the smallest fans of computer entertainment. You find yourself in a magical land and become the head of the railway station. He is instructed to seat animals on the wagons and load objects into them, the first letter of the name of which corresponds to the letter on the locomotive pulling the train. Hurry up, because the machinist mouse is in a hurry to hit the road.

item.title: Baby Bear Jigsaw
item.description: Logic games for children aged 4-5 give you a unique opportunity to train your ingenuity and spatial thinking. Here you will find a virtual version of the Rubik’s Cube. The principle of solving this puzzle is known to everyone: it is necessary to rotate the parts of the cube so as to collect squares of the same color on each side.

item.title: Baby Beast Beauty
item.description: While playing Wash the Animals, you meet Princess Cinderella’s favorite dog. Together with her mistress, she goes to the royal ball. The little girl turned to your beauty salon for girls and their pets with a request to prepare her for the celebration. Only you can handle such a responsible task, so get to work as soon as possible. To begin with, help your ward take a bath, then put her hair in order, do her hair and, finally, pick up original accessories that will emphasize the beauty and style of the dog.

item.title: Baby Elsa Homemade Cookies Cooking
item.description: An interesting game for children aged 3-4 will introduce you to a firefighter puppy who is ready to put out all the fires. But you need to help him with this. The screen will display a fire area with a certain number, and you need to set the same number on the pump, and then give a command to the rescue dog.

item.title: Baby Fun Day
item.description: Princess Sophia has a little sister whom she loves to take care of. But the baby is very capricious, cries and wakes up even in the middle of the night. Help the heroine swaddle the baby and give her a bottle of milk. With your help, Sofia will become a caring nanny for her sister. And after the baby falls asleep, you can do a little to yourself.

item.title: Baby Hazel Differences
item.description: Dasha is waiting for her mother in the flower shop. She got bored and decided to have some fun. The girl is offered several short games to choose from. The only condition is to make sure that the girl’s mother does not notice what her daughter is doing. Just close the window with the game in time, if suddenly someone appears.

item.title: Baby Hazel Royal Bath
item.description: In this exciting game you have to take care of a small child who needs constant attention. Take a bath using all the objects presented on the screen. Get water in the bath, add foam and my baby there. After that, dry it with a fluffy towel and tell a story.

item.title: Baby Snow Sick Day
item.description: In this game you have to play the role of a babysitter for a small child. The baby has peed himself, and he needs to be changed urgently. Do all the necessary hygiene procedures, and then choose a cute outfit, socks and hairstyle for the child. The finished result can be fixed by saving or printing.

item.title: Banana Run
item.description: During the game Monkey Adventure you have to control an animal that has wonderful stretching arms. Thanks to this feature, the monkey can jump from tree to tree. Move around the locations using the power of “rubber” hands, collect bonuses, lives, bananas, coconuts and save your fellow tribesmen.

item.title: Barbie And Ken Christmas
item.description: This game has a wide range of possibilities. In it, you can not only dress up a boy and a girl, using a large number of various wardrobe items, but also seriously work on changing their appearance. Hairstyle, hair color, eye shape and skin tone can be corrected. In addition, a large number of accessories are available.

item.title: Barbie Dancing Princess Jigsaw Puzzle
item.description: All puzzle lovers will definitely like this game, and if you love Winx, then you will be completely delighted. Here you are invited to collect images of the fairy Leila. The puzzle has an unusual appearance, the picture is presented in the form of a circle and is divided into sectors. With each level, the number of elements increases.

item.title: Batman Shadow Combat
item.description: While playing Batman 3D, you are faced with the task of modifying a giant bot - one of the best inventions of the Dark Knight. This monster is designed to protect Gotham City from bandits and robbers. After finishing work, feel free to click on the map, choose the difficulty level and start patrolling the streets.

item.title: Battle Robot Samurai Age
item.description: During the game for two Blast it 7 you have to go to the distant future and become a participant in exciting competitions. Choose one of the robots and go to the playing field, where you have to measure your strength against 3 competitors. Try to destroy them with the help of bombs that you will lay out in a fantastic labyrinth.

item.title: Battle Tank
item.description: In this game for boys for 7 years old, you will have to go to a not too optimistic future where nightmarish zombies have taken over almost the entire planet. In order to get to one of the cities, in which there is still a military garrison of people, use a small tank. Try to drive it to the rescue checkpoint.

item.title: Beach Bar
item.description: The Make Cocktails game invites you to take part in a master class on creating original alcoholic drinks. Together with your assistant, try to create the perfect aperitif, able to amaze with its originality and taste the jury of the bartending competition in which you will take part.

item.title: Beach House Cleaning
item.description: The main task of this game is to perfectly clean the hotel room. Of course, you need to cope in a short time, because new guests will drop in here soon. So, getting started, you need to carefully examine the room, find special containers, lockers, shelves where to put things, and throw out the garbage.

item.title: Bear Adventure
item.description: Controlling a cyborg soldier, you have to find the enemy’s lair and destroy everyone who is there. To do this, you can use a whole arsenal of the most modern weapons and various tricks. For defeating the enemy, some cash is required. They can be spent on buying more powerful weapons and other improvements.

item.title: Bear Boom
item.description: Bears in a row game invites you to the cloudy kingdom of magic bears. A terrible sorceress has bewitched all the inhabitants of this fabulous country. To dispel the spell, you need to break the magic tablets on each level of an exciting game, collecting chains of cubs of the same color.

item.title: Bear Run
item.description: Considering that the main character of the game is an elephant, it is very difficult to call the process runners. But that’s not the point. The goal of the game is to go as far as possible and Crazy Games as many points as possible. By the way, you can arrange a competition in this with friends. Instructions can be viewed before starting. But if in a nutshell, then jump over the pits and collect bananas.

item.title: Beat Dropper
item.description: DJ music

item.title: Become A Puppy Groomer
item.description: While playing Animal Hair Salon you become a leading specialist of one of the beauty salons of a magical land. Thanks to your diligence and talent, you managed to gain popularity among the inhabitants of a fairy-tale city, and they invited you to take part in a hairdressing competition. The heroes of the game for girls Hair Salon for Animals - the cat Sophia and the dog Peg, have decided to become your helpers.

item.title: BFF Princess Vote For FIFA 2018
item.description: The heroine of the game decided to go in for sports, and you are invited to choose a cool outfit for her. To begin with, decide on the components of the future tracksuit, choosing not only the style, but also the color and ornament. You will also need to add a hairstyle, shoes, dumbbells and other accessories. The finished image can be saved or printed.

item.title: Bff Traditional Thanksgiving Turkey
item.description: The game Cooking a turkey with mom will teach you how to properly process a bird. In it, you will learn what needs to be done in order to end up with a delicious turkey. Detailed instructions await you, which includes a large number of steps, starting from buying a bird in a store. Just follow the prompts of the game.

item.title: Bffs Day Of The Dead
item.description: The process of the unusual Disney Princess Zombies game is dedicated to the cutie Snow White. Here she looks not quite in the usual way, because the cartoon beauty has turned into a zombie. But the girl has not lost her charm, and now you have to dress her up in fashionable things, as well as add accessories and a hairstyle.

item.title: Big Chungus Bubble Shooter
item.description: A little bunny needs to protect his possessions from a crowd of enemies, and you need to help in this. At your disposal is a firearm, use it to destroy the advancing enemies. For completing each level you will receive money that you can spend on improving your performance.

item.title: Big Farm Link
item.description: While playing Garden Farm, you meet the owner of a small farm. More recently, the girl worked as a clerk in a huge corporation, but when she got out of town, she firmly decided to become a farmer. The beauty bought the abandoned farm and asks you for help. By controlling the movements of the heroine of the game about the garden and the farm, try to turn a ruined ruined economy into a successful enterprise.

item.title: Big Hero 6 Bay Max Surgery
item.description: The Decepticon army attacks the science center, which contains a huge supply of Energon. A small team of robots is forced to accept an unequal battle and protect warehouses with precious energy. Choose one of the members of the Autobot squad, go to the battlefield and try to destroy the army of traitor robots and their commanders.

item.title: Big Hunter Online
item.description: A very funny game. On the edge of the cliff is your character, who is very similar to Robin Hood, only an old one. He has a bow in his hands and needs to shoot flying birds. Arrows “up-down” adjust the direction of the bow, and “right” - pulls the string. The shot occurs when you press the “space”. Sometimes birds can take revenge.

item.title: Bikini Bottom Tic-Tac-Toe
item.description: Sea battle will help to have a good time and develop logical thinking. The game has two modes, and you can play alone or with a friend against each other. Moreover, in a single player game, you will have to fight not against a computer, but against a real player. But in this case, you will have to wait a bit until the computer finds an opponent for you.

item.title: Billy The Kid
item.description: Today you have to fight alone with a whole army of bandits and criminals. There is nowhere to retreat, so shoot at your enemies or throw dynamite at them - it will be easier to get rid of a whole group of enemies at once. Collect coins that fall out of the defeated enemy and buy yourself new weapons and additional protection.

item.title: Bionic Race
item.description: While playing Lego Robots 2, you meet Lloyd, the Green Ninja and the nephew of the great master Wu, who go in search of an ancient artifact. Parts of the legendary weapons are scattered throughout the world of Ninjago, and in order to get to them, Lloyd decided to use a super-modern aircraft in the form of a dragon. Destroy the enemies attacking you and collect all parts of the artifact.

item.title: Birds Coloring
item.description: The process of playing Coloring Pages for Girls will turn you into a real artist. Here you are invited to color pictures with cute animals. Choose any image from the proposed assortment, and then proceed to the creative process. To do this, you have many different colors at your disposal. Choose any color, and also decide whether you will act with a brush or use a fill. If something goes wrong in the coloring, you can always use an eraser.

item.title: Black And White Dimensions
item.description: An interesting game, captivating, first of all, with its design. All chips on the playing field are divided into black and white. Thanks to this, an exciting gameplay awaits you, which consists in removing pairs of identical tiles.

item.title: Black Knight
item.description: This game has a lot from the legendary first “Diablo”. Choose a character, watch a video in which his bride is kidnapped, and go to the dungeons in search. Along the way, you will encounter battles with skeletons, the walking dead and other creatures. Pick up new weapons, develop and use magic. Extra items can be sold. For those who have never seen Diablo, there are clues.

item.title: Blaze Trucks
item.description: The launch of the game for children Cars will show you the characters of the cartoon of the same name. In it you will need to take part in the racing championship and try to win all its stages. At the beginning of the children’s game, only Lightning McQueen is available from the heroes, but as you progress, other cars will open for you. Winding roads in different cities of the world await you ahead.

item.title: Block Craft 3D
item.description: Great arcade games Sonic Minecraft will introduce you to a funny cartoon character who cannot stand in one place for a second and is constantly moving somewhere. Keep him company and start either passing the round, destroying the enemies you meet and collecting coins, or fight with the enemy in the arena, trying to throw him into the abyss. The main task is to help Sonic rise as high as possible in the standings of the Minecraft world.

item.title: Block Ninja HD
item.description: Go through the levels that make up the exciting game Minecraft 2d. On your way objects from squares will appear, with which you can do whatever you want - destroy, build and explore new lands. There are no restrictions on the passage of the Minecraft game. You can become a creator, a fisherman, a carpenter and even a musician.

item.title: Block Riddle
item.description: While playing Riddles Magic Story you have to help a funny dwarf get a precious stone. At each level you will see a room full of different obstacles. It is necessary to cut the ropes on which the stone is suspended so that it rolls to the gnome. Avoid evil enemies and collect coins!

item.title: Blocks Battle
item.description: Developing for children from 7 years old

item.title: Blocky Runner
item.description: An interesting game that develops dexterity and reaction speed. Your native island has become completely different. It is crawling with monsters, pitted with lava ditches and deep rivers in which you can easily drown. It’s time to leave this inhospitable place. Run, overcome obstacles and collect coins to buy upgrades. Management: W - attack, A, S, D - movement, SPACE - jump.

item.title: Blossom Crush Legend
item.description: This toy sends you to a small flower bed. On it it is necessary to make bouquets of flowers of the same species. For each collected bouquet you will have points. Go through all the levels of the game, try to Crazy Games the maximum number and become one of its champions.

item.title: Bob The Robber
item.description: The protagonist of the game Bob the Robber 1 is a police officer who works as a night watchman in a history museum. Usually, his work is boring, but one night a robber got into the room. The user’s task is to help the guard to detain the thief before he escapes. View from a third person, control - keyboard. The process of the game about 1 robber Bob looks like a race along the corridor.

item.title: Bob The Robber 2
item.description: Take control of the thief Bob and roam the city wreaking havoc on your way. Taught by bitter experience, the townspeople are trying to protect their home. But no matter what alarms and guards they install at their homes, Bob can bypass any obstacles. Often a strong wooden bat comes to his aid. She easily neutralizes all kinds of security robots.

item.title: Bob The Robber 3
item.description: Help the thief escape from the police. All you have to do is use the mouse to drag the robber around the playing field, preventing him from colliding with the cops. The longer you survive, the more points you earn that will allow you to move on to the next level. And remember, you can’t touch the walls either.

item.title: Bob the Robber 4 Season 1 France
item.description: In this game you have to help two delinquents to escape from the crime scene. Use arrow keys to move. The main task is to stun the watchman and clear the way for escape. To pick up or use an item - press X, to run - C. And remember, you only need to act together.

item.title: Bob the Robber 4 Season 2 Russia
item.description: Today you will play on behalf of a thief who stole valuables and money from the house, and now a whole squad of police is chasing him. You need to help him escape at any cost, moving through the intricate labyrinth and trying not to fall into the field of view of the guards. Use any cover to hide from the pursuit of the police.

item.title: Bob the Robber 4 Season 3 Japan
item.description: In this game you will be in the role of a fugitive criminal. You will need to jump on the roofs and balconies of buildings in order to collect bags of money and banknotes. Try not to fall into the hands of the police. The task is to Crazy Games as many points as indicated at the top of the screen in order to move on to the next stage.

item.title: Bob the Robber 5 The Temple Adventure
item.description: In this game, the user (first-person view) will have to steal the century from the Museum of History. Initially, he did not have any equipment for this. But if you look around carefully, you can find a lot of useful things. All of them fall into the inventory and you will have to think carefully about what and how to apply. If it’s really difficult, press the hint button.

item.title: Bonnie Gucci And Prada
item.description: Even at work, girls want to look attractive. Your task is to sew a new outfit for the heroine of the game. To begin with, you will need to select the details of future clothing, indicating their color and adding, if desired, patterns. After cutting and sewing, all that remains is to choose a hairstyle and accessories.

item.title: Bow Master Stickman Hero
item.description: According to the terms of the shooting game Little People, you will have to control a drawn stickman who acts as a special agent and performs super complex and responsible tasks. You will have to take part in skirmishes on the streets of the city, in the bank, in the subway and at the airport. It’s hard enough to play. The enemy appears suddenly and instantly opens fire. Black men are everywhere, so be careful and careful.

item.title: Boxing Fighter Shadow Battle
item.description: The action of this game takes place in a saloon, somewhere in the wild Wild West. You have to put on a cowboy costume and take part in a fight. The game is three-dimensional and very cool. In it, you can grab tables, chairs, smash them on the head of an opponent, or throw one cowboy into a crowd of others. But be careful not to let the opponents close to you from the rear.

item.title: Boys & Girls Bubble Pop
item.description: Now you can have a lot of fun popping balloons! On the screen you will see a large number of balls, and some of them contain gifts. Click on groups of elements of the same color to make them burst and disappear from the screen. You need to release all the cute balloon toy gifts.

item.title: Bridal Shower Party for Moana
item.description: No wedding is complete without a bridesmaid. Naturally, this participant of the holiday should also look attractive. The game asks you to come up with a cool outfit for the bridesmaid by choosing a great dress for her and complementing it with cute accessories. Don’t forget about the right hairstyle.

item.title: BTS Dinosaur Coloring Book
item.description: Need to distract your child? A game about dinosaurs for children 5 years old is quite suitable. Before starting, you can select the interface language. Russian is available. It is recommended to read the “how to play” section to understand the goals and objectives. After the start, the gamer automatically enters the training level. But you can choose the first stage right away (see the button above).

item.title: Bubble Burst
item.description: One of the simplest, and at the same time the best ball games. Multi-colored clusters hang from the “ceiling” of the game, and you have to knock out groups of balls of the same color from this mass. Each ball knocked out brings you 10 points, and the more points you Crazy Games, the higher your position in the ranking of players will be. No timer, no levels - play as much as you want.

item.title: Bubble Defence
item.description: To win this game, you need to find all pairs of the same color balls as quickly as possible. According to the rules of the toy, they can be connected only horizontally or vertically, while the connection should not pass through other balls. As soon as you connect the right balls together, they will instantly disappear. Try to make sure that not a single pair of balls remains on the playing field.

item.title: Bubble Farm
item.description: The puzzle game Bubble Shooter invites you to get rid of a wall of colorful balls. To do this, you need to throw similar balls into it, falling into groups of the same color as the projectile. After that, this whole combination will disappear. The direction of the flight of the ball is determined by the arrow: direct it with the mouse in the desired direction. If several rolls are not successful, the wall will drop one position.

item.title: Bubble Shooter
item.description: Take part in an exciting competition and try to win. You need to make chains of stones of the same color. Try to go through as many levels of the game as possible and get into the leaderboard posted on the developer’s website.

item.title: Bubble Shooter Gold Mining
item.description: Logic shooting games Balls are able to capture attention for a long time. Here you will need to control a funny monkey, which you need to help pop the balloons with the help of darts. The game consists of a large number of levels, and each of them features an original construction of balls. You need to choose the direction of the dart’s flight and the strength of the throw in order to burst as many balls as possible.

item.title: Bullet Fire 2
item.description: Territory War is a turn-based strategy game where you have to command the troops of an entire nation. Send detachments of your warriors to capture intermediate points, and then to storm the main fortifications of the enemy. There are many types of weapons at your disposal - you just need to learn how to use them correctly.

item.title: Bumblebee`s Music Mix
item.description: Choose your character and set out to unravel the Autobot Matrix Code. To solve it, you need to collect more logos. Decepticon soldiers will hinder you. Deal with them with a cannon or a sword. To replenish your health, collect Energon cubes. Hurry - time to complete the task is limited.

item.title: Bunny Skater
item.description: In this game you have to control a cute bunny who goes on a long and exciting journey. Collect coins and carrots along the way to earn as many reward points as possible. Avoid abysses and other traps, otherwise you will lose game lives. And if they run out, you lose.

item.title: Burger Chef
item.description: After starting the game, you will have a unique chance to become the owner of the McDonald’s network for a while. The task is to establish the work of all links, the interaction of which will ultimately allow you to get delicious burgers and earn money. Make sure everything runs like clockwork.

item.title: Butterfly Coloring Book
item.description: Here is a bow coloring for toddlers. If suddenly they do not go to kindergarten for some reason, you can study vegetables at home using a computer. Using the example of a colored picture, it is easy to explain to the child the process of bulb ripening. Coloring is easy: move the mouse cursor to the desired color, click and go to the area in the picture. Click there again.

item.title: Butterfly Kyodai
item.description: In order to become the winner of the game Mahjong logical butterflies, you will need attentiveness and ingenuity. The authors propose to collect butterflies from individual wings placed on the playing field. As soon as two identical wings are found, they turn into a beautiful butterfly, which, waving its newly acquired wings at you, flies off the screen. Be careful and try to create all the butterflies as quickly as possible, because the time to complete the task is limited.

item.title: Candy Blast
item.description: In candy land, you are invited to solve a Tetris-like puzzle by finding straight or broken lines from colored candies. If found, click. Accumulations of sweets are burned, the top ones are shifted down and new ones are added. And you get points accordingly. The more lollipops you burn at once, the more points you earn.

item.title: Candy Blast Match 3
item.description: After starting this game you have to build houses for cute animals. In order to get the desired object, you need to make combinations of three or more identical elements on a special playing field. Swap adjacent parts to get the coveted combinations. Disappearing, they will give you one part of the house.

item.title: Candy Land
item.description: It’s no secret that all children love sweets. You are also invited to work in a pastry shop, which offers a wide range of desserts. Try to fulfill all the orders of all the little visitors, selling them the desired treats. The game consists of several levels, and on each of them you need to earn a certain amount of money.

item.title: Candy Piano Tiles
item.description: It’s time to enter the dance competition! But first, choose the character you want to control. Then it remains only to correctly press the arrow buttons, the symbols of which appear on the screen. This should be done only at the moment when the symbol falls exactly into the marked area.

item.title: Candy Pop
item.description: Diamond Match 3 game invites you to take part in an exciting competition that brings together players from all over the world. In this toy, you need to make chains of gems of the same color. At each stage of the game you have to collect a certain number of stones in a limited time. Try to go through as many levels of the game as possible and get into the high Crazy Games table posted on the website of the game developers.

item.title: Candy Rain 4
item.description: There is a commotion at a huge candy factory - one of the sorting machines has broken down. Candies of different colors are mixed in the bunker, and you have to sort the sweets by color. Try to complete the task as quickly as possible, because children all over the world are waiting for their favorite treat.

item.title: Car Wash
item.description: The process of playing Cars on Big Wheels allows you to take part in an extreme race. Drive a fast and powerful car, moving along the track, equipped with a variety of jumps and other add-ons. Along the way, try to collect bonus items to earn more reward points.

item.title: Cars Hidden Alphabet
item.description: The Alphabet game for children aged 3-4 invites gamers to visit a fabulous city where wonderful letter-men live. You have to go through its streets and find all the locals. Carefully inspect every nook and cranny and find letters that dream of hiding from you. Your finds will go to the bottom of the screen and line up there in even rows.

item.title: Cartoon Cars Coloring Book
item.description: Online coloring for boys Cars is a great way to develop a child’s ability to concentrate, memory, perseverance and accuracy. As a rule, children are attracted to non-childish games from childhood. They even draw, unlike the girls, big fire trucks, military tanks, planes and police motorcycles. Of course, car coloring pages can be downloaded and printed, and then you can decorate as much as you like. And, you can play online, try and start again, experimenting with the colors of your car, its tuning and decorations.

item.title: Cartoon Fruit Puzzle
item.description: A colorful puzzle game for children 3 years old invites you to show maximum care and try to assemble a cute picture with a tiger from scattered pieces for free. Grab the appropriate elements with the cursor and connect them to each other, focusing on the shape and part of the picture depicted on them. It will be easy for children 3 years old to play our virtual puzzles, thanks to a small hint.

item.title: Cats Puzzle Time
item.description: The process of playing Jigsaw puzzles for children 4 5 years old will appeal to everyone who loves to collect pictures from scattered pieces. The game has two modes: easy and hard. They differ in the number of elements into which the pictures will be divided. You just need to connect the pieces in such a way that you end up with the correct image.

item.title: Caveman Hunt
item.description: Tired of toys in which everything is like in a shooting gallery? The Big Hunt game is somewhat out of the general range. Firstly, here you can move around, while the first-person view, weapons are shown. Secondly, the tasks are quite difficult. So, according to bourgeois concepts of hunting, you will have to shoot from prepared sites. On each you need to get a certain number of trophies.

item.title: Checkers
item.description: The process of playing Checkers for two black and white will appeal to fans of intellectual pursuits. First, decide whether you will play with a virtual opponent or with a real one. Also indicate the level of difficulty. Then you can safely proceed to the gameplay by moving the checkers on the black cells of the board.

item.title: Checkers Mania
item.description: Do you like to play checkers? Then you will definitely like this virtual version. The goal is to remove all the opponent’s checkers from the board. Move yours one square diagonally, trying not to expose the enemy. Moves are made sequentially. If the checker reaches the opposite edge of the board, it becomes a king.

item.title: Checkers samename1
item.description: Do you like to play checkers? Try to experience their virtual version. A board of 64 cells will appear on the screen. There are two sets of checkers of different colors on it. Move your pieces in such a way that they are not next to the opponent’s checkers. Otherwise, the enemy will be able to cut them down, that is, remove them from the board!

item.title: Chef Slash
item.description: Chef game for kids invites you to the culinary school of the famous Frenchman Monsieur Svin. Today he will show you how to make a chocolate cupcake. Carefully follow the chef’s tips and strictly follow them. First, prepare the air dough for cupcakes, put it in molds and send it to the oven. While they are baking, prepare the original chocolate nougat. Once the cupcakes are ready, decorate them with cream and let cool slightly.

item.title: Christmas Balls
item.description: In this game you find yourself in the fantastic world of Google Ice. The funny creatures that inhabit it are very curious and often fall into traps because of this. This time they climbed into a huge stone bag, and you have to help them out of the trap. Use the mouse cursor to select chains of big-eyed koloboks and pull them out of the trap.

item.title: Circus Hidden Objects
item.description: A very fun game. In it you have to entertain the audience in the circus, controlling the clown. He stands on the ball and stay on it is already a difficult task. You also need to catch objects falling from the ceiling. The more the clown moves, the more the ball swings under him. For the allotted time you need to Crazy Games a certain number of points to go to the next level.

item.title: Clash Of Tanks
item.description: The game Rules of War nuclear strategy will make even the lazy one play, if, of course, you figure out what’s what. This is not difficult. You can not even look at the instructions, although it will not be superfluous. The whole nuclear strategy is to move your armored tractor from stage to stage and gradually build blocks to it. From time to time there are clashes with the enemy and then a real nuclear war begins.

item.title: Clash Of Warlord Orcs
item.description: You can skip the long text background. There is nothing useful in it, except for 100500 English letters. Next comes the learning phase with endless instructions. Disabling will not work. But then everything is simple: build a base, train troops, rob caravans and wipe enemies with their castles into dust. In addition to conventional troops, you can choose magical support.

item.title: Club Sandwich
item.description: In this game you have to take on the management of a restaurant. The faster and better the service in it, the greater the chances of getting an award in the competition and thereby attracting more customers. It is required to overtake competitors and prove that your institution is the best in the city. To do this, you need to seat each client at a free table, write down the order, bring it, and then remove it from the table.

item.title: Coloring Time Animals
item.description: During the game Coloring for two you will be able to show your creativity. Here you are invited to color the image of two pretty girls. At the bottom of the screen is a palette that includes a large number of colors. Choose any of them and apply as you wish.

item.title: Colors Of Spring Princess Gowns
item.description: While playing Princess and Queen Dress Up, you become one of the dressers involved in the filming of a new horror movie. You have to prepare a young actress for one of the scenes in the movie. Make her an original hairstyle and choose a costume that matches her role. The outfit you created will give confidence to the actress-princess, and the shooting with her participation will go as well as possible.

item.title: Cooking Fast Hotdogs And Burgers Craze
item.description: In this game, you have to become an employee of one of the eateries located in the stadium. Try to fulfill the orders of all visitors to your cafe as quickly as possible. The money you earn at the establishment can be used to purchase new equipment and products.

item.title: Cooking Scene
item.description: During the online game Restaurant Business you become one of the employees of a small cafe in the center of the capital of the fairy kingdom. Try to serve each of the visitors as quickly as possible. Thanks to your efforts, all the wishes of customers will be fulfilled and they will definitely become regular guests of your cafe.

item.title: Corporate Overlord
item.description: It’s time to take a break from virtual wars and destruction, having tried your hand at creation. This can be done through the building strategy game. The main task for the players in it will be to build an amusement park and make happy a certain number of visitors (at each level this number increases) for a certain period of time. For a successful game, the strategy must be correct and you will have to develop it in the shortest possible time.

item.title: Cowboy VS Robots
item.description: Robots for 2 game is an exciting hybrid of shooter and rpg, designed for two players. Together with your partner, you will control a pair of robots, whose task is to complete all levels, helping each other to shoot enemies. The principle of the game resembles the famous Fireboy and Watergirl series, but there are differences. Your characters can shoot at the enemy, the enemy also fires back. There are not so many logical difficulties in the game - more action.

item.title: Crazy Chopper
item.description: During the game Flight Simulators on Airplanes you have to control a huge passenger liner. At the first level, you have to master landing on the runway. When approaching the airfield, reduce altitude in advance, reducing engine speed, extend flaps and landing gear. Control the flight of the aircraft with the mouse. Land smoothly and stop.

item.title: Crazy Parking
item.description: The fact that this is an international airport is only indicated by aircraft that are visible at the edges of the screen. It does not affect the gameplay in any way. You will have to park your car at any time of the day. The game has 12 levels, which provide different options for the location of the parking lot. You can compete with your friends by playing the game in turns.

item.title: Cross Road Exit
item.description: In this game, you’ll have to help the SpongeBob characters to park their boat. On the first level you will do it with hints. That is, along the designated trajectory. However, you will have to sweat on your own. There is a limited time to complete the task, so hurry up. If you don’t, you’ll have to start all over again.

item.title: Cross The Bridge
item.description: If you see the inscription “There is no way out” - do not believe it. It’s always there, and the Autobots will find it. And in this game you will help them. You need to control two robots that can dock to each other (oh, it’s so romantic!). Docking is needed in order to overcome some obstacles in principle possible. You can play alone or together, controlling different robots.

item.title: Crush The Animals
item.description: In this game you have to go to the beach where a cat and a dog have decided to have a mock battle. Decide whether you will fight a real opponent or a virtual one. After that, it remains only to attack the enemy, trying to hit him with projectiles that take away health points. Their number is fixed at the top of the screen.

item.title: Cube Blast
item.description: The game Cubes in a row invites you to become a demining specialist. At each level of this exciting toy, you must turn off the electronic fuse system. Try to remove colorful pixels from the screen in a limited time. If you do not manage to destroy the colored squares, an explosion will occur, and you will have to start the game from the very beginning.

item.title: Cut My Rope
item.description: Simple kids games invite you to do math with Mickey Mouse. He will ask for addition examples, and you just need to choose the correct answer from the five offered. If you answer correctly, you will receive a prize star. Your task is to earn as many of these stars as possible so that Mickey gives you a high mark.

item.title: Cute Animal Shapes
item.description: Any game for a 2 year old child is, first of all, entertainment associated with learning or acquiring any skills. So today, together with Dasha, you will go to visit her grandmother, in the village. The girl always helps the old woman with the housework, and this time she can choose any of the premises on the farm and get to work.

item.title: Cute Cars Racing
item.description: An exciting car racing game for children 3 years old invites you to take part in the delivery of goods. After the launch, you find yourself on a dairy farm, where you have to work as a driver of a cute truck.

item.title: Cute Pony Care
item.description: The famous Rainbow Dash turned to your magical beauty salon. She dreams of changing her image a bit, both as a pony and as a girl. Try to come up with an original style for the beauty that will emphasize her beauty and personality, turning her into the most beautiful pony in Ponyville.

item.title: Cute Pony Coloring Book
item.description: There is no easier pony game for girls 8 years old than this one. It does not require anything but imagination and taste when choosing an outfit for the main character. Who will he be: a pony or a unicorn, you decide. Use the virtual buttons on the screen to change its appearance. At the end, the picture can be saved or printed. You can invent and create several different fairy tale characters.

item.title: Cute Puppies Jigsaw
item.description: While playing Barboskin’s puzzles, you get to know the smallest member of the family of amazing dogs. Playing with a family photo album, the Kid accidentally cut a photo with scissors, which depicts all the children in the family. During the game for girls you have to help a little puppy to put together a photo from a huge number of individual pieces. Carefully inspect the playing field and find a place for each piece of the puzzle.

item.title: Cyborg Slayer
item.description: You got into a hostile world, in order to survive here, you need to fight. Minecraft robot games offer a boxing ring as an arena for battle, where giant iron cars are waiting for you. Powerful blows that you will inflict on the enemy should knock him down. Don’t let up for a second. To protect against enemy attacks, try to block more often.

item.title: Dark Ninja
item.description: The game “Ninja in action” is a fun training of ingenuity and attentiveness. Each level is an original puzzle. The little ninja needs to get to the transition to the next stage. Help the kid by launching him into flight from the catapult. Along the way, you can collect shurikens to get more reward points.

item.title: Dash Rocket
item.description: If all your life you dreamed of becoming a tester and pyrotechnician, then you definitely should try this game. Somewhere in the mountains there is a launch pad. You need to launch a rocket up and try to fly to the stars. It won’t work right away. But for each launch, money will be charged. And still collect crystals. Spend them on upgrades and climb higher and higher.

item.title: Death Fight
item.description: According to the terms of the Fighting for two with weapons game, you have to defend yourself from hooligans on the streets of the city. As you probably already guessed, you have a knife for this purpose. However, the enemy is armed no worse. In order to defeat him in a fight, you need to be very dexterous and resourceful. Constantly move around the screen and try not to let the bully get too close.

item.title: Deep Sea Trijong
item.description: If you’re looking for a quiet way to pass the time, Artifact Mahjong is the way to go. Especially if you are a fan of logic games. It is available in three modes, however, only one is possible online. The other two can only be launched after downloading. As for the passage, you will have to collect almost classic Chinese mahjong.

item.title: Def Island
item.description: While playing Planes Tu 95 you have to learn how to fly a Soviet strategic bomber. With the help of an instructor, you must take off at one airfield and land at another. But at the same time, the Aircraft Tu 95 game gives you the opportunity to exercise full control over the state of the aircraft in flight. These are altitude, speed, flap position, and so on. The game is primarily aimed at boys and challenges them to complete several challenging missions including mid-air refueling.

item.title: Defend The Tank
item.description: The Tanki 2 game will take you to a world where a terrible zombie apocalypse has taken place. Now the streets are filled with the risen dead, and only a tank will help you survive in this terrible situation. You need to move in your vehicle along a given track, performing only 2 actions: destroying zombies along the way and collecting coins. Fuel is limited, so the tank will stop sooner or later.

item.title: Defense Of The Tank
item.description: The World War II Strategy game has a fairly extensive menu that allows you to set the desired settings, select the mode you like, and also see the instructions. It will be of little use if you do not speak English, so you will have to figure it out along the way. However, life will be a little easier with the introductory video, which, if desired, can be skipped. So, the events of the game Strategy 2 World War take place in 1944.

item.title: Didi & Friends Connect the Dots
item.description: In this game you will be asked to collect animals from scattered pieces. Such a fun puzzle will bring a lot of positive. Just place the elements in the right places based on the existing template and get images of cute animals like sheep, lion and more. You can repeat if you want!

item.title: Dino Jigsaw
item.description: While playing Jigsaw Dinosaurs, you become one of the participants in a unique program to recreate ancient dinosaurs. You need to assemble an image of a Tyrannosaurus Rex from separate pieces. While moving the puzzles around the playing field, try to choose the right place for each of them and show your friend a photo of this terrible monster.

item.title: Dinosaur Coloring Book
item.description: If you want to take part in the adventures of funny ancient lizards, then the Dinosaur Age game is quite suitable for this. There are two characters - a large one and a small one, but they are controlled alternately. At the same time, a small dinosaur either sits on the back of a fellow, or embarks on a journey itself, during which it is necessary to collect coins. The heroes of the game help each other in overcoming obstacles.

item.title: Dinosaurs World Hidden Miniature
item.description: Have you seen a movie about a man-made park with dinosaurs? Then you will like the game Dinosaur Hunt. It will have to shoot and drive a jeep. You will see for yourself how difficult the work of an employee of an exotic zoo is.

item.title: Discover Ancient Rome
item.description: If you want to have fun and exercise your logical thinking at the same time, the Mahjong Titan game is quite suitable for this. It is a kind of solitaire, in which chips are used instead of cards, like in dominoes, only with different patterns instead of dots. The task of the gamer is to find the same drawings. Two identical pieces are selected with the mouse and disappear from the board.

item.title: Disney Fairies: Pixie Party Couture
item.description: In this game you have to collect images from pieces dedicated to the Winx sorceresses. The screen presents a large number of confused elements, and you just have to find the right places for them. The tooltip that opens when you hover over the question mark will help.

item.title: Disney Princess Christmas Ball
item.description: In this game, you are given the opportunity to evaluate your ability as a designer. In order to get an estimate, you need to create an original New Year’s outfit from the items provided. After your model is ready, press the rate button and see how many points you got. Try to come up with a festive costume that will Crazy Games the maximum number of points.

item.title: DJ Shaq
item.description: Game Create your own music DJ invites you to create a variety of melodies. In front of you is a DJ set with two turntables. You need to rotate them in such a way as to catch the notes. Caught should be exactly those elements that are indicated at the top of the screen. If you make a mistake, the game will end. But if you do everything right, the next level, more difficult, will open.

item.title: Doctor Panda
item.description: The game Surgeon invites gamers to try their hand at the role of the chief physician of the fairy kingdom. It is you who will be the first to help Princess Sofia, who fell off her horse and was badly hurt. Put the baby on the surgical chair and carefully examine each of the wounds. Then try to clean the abrasions with the help of special tools, apply medicines and special bandages.

item.title: Dog Puzzle
item.description: Kids games about dogs offer you to help little puppy Tim. He, like any other dog, wants to have fun, although the owner of his pranks will definitely not approve. That is why it is necessary to act only when no one is in the room. But if there is a knock on the door, then drop all your activities and pretend that nothing is happening. In the allotted time, you need to have time to eat a ham, tear a pillow, drive cats and do a lot more!

item.title: Doodle God Rocket Scientist
item.description: The Rocket game is designed for those who want to kill time, but not really strain at the same time. It doesn’t have to be anything special. As well as frantically hitting the keyboard. All you have to do is launch the rocket and make it fly as high as possible. Collect bonuses along the way. Basically, these are coins and cans of fuel. By the way, it can be useful to fly not strictly up, but deviating to the sides - more surprises.

item.title: Dora Spot The Difference
item.description: Looking for simple games for kids 4 years old? You found what you were looking for! This toy will perfectly entertain the child, and most importantly, will accelerate his development. All that is needed is to fill the contours of the picture with suitable fragments. The result is a beautiful drawing with one or another animal. The only drawback is a small number of blanks.

item.title: Dotted Girl Family Christmas
item.description: Christmas is coming soon, and in order to properly welcome Santa, the house must be sparkling clean. Help the two sisters get ready for the holiday. It will be necessary to arrange beautifully wrapped gifts under the tree, and throw everything unnecessary into the wastebasket. Next up is the bedroom and kitchen. There’s plenty of work to do here, so get to work.

item.title: Downhill Ski
item.description: While playing Sports 3d you will have to apply your football skills to prove your title of a football star and win this dynamic duel. Choose one of the six teams that you will play as part of and enter the field. Intercept the ball from the opponent, and then try to break through to the goal or pass the ball to another player on your team to complete the attack.

item.title: Draw One Line
item.description: Logic games for girls 8 9 years old offer to help a flying kitten. They have a huge number of levels, on each of which you will see a construction of ice and stone blocks of various shapes. The cat is inside the building, and you need to clear the way for him to fly upstairs. The level will be considered passed when the character of the game for girls 8 9 years old takes off into the air.

item.title: Dress Up Who Bonnie Coachella
item.description: The girl is going to an important event, but she does not have a suitable outfit. You need to help the heroine of the game. To do this, go to the studio and choose any four items there that will determine the appearance of the future product. But the result can be very unpredictable, it will not always please the heroine!

item.title: Drift Cup Racing
item.description: Once a brave dinosaur Rex decided to show everyone what he is capable of in the game Racing for kids 5 years old. This character is sure to win you over with the incredible stunts he can perform on his motorcycle. Racing for children for 5 years allows kids to learn how to use a computer keyboard and clearly demonstrate that even a clumsy dinosaur after flying in the air can just as easily land on the ground as it took off before.

item.title: Easter Coloring Book
item.description: After starting this game, you will see a huge number of Easter eggs that you will need to color. To do this, you have a large number of colors at your disposal. Dip the brush into any paint, and then click on the part that you are now going to color. It will be fun!

item.title: Easter Day Coloring
item.description: In this game, you will have the opportunity not only to show your creative talents, but also to learn the letters of the English alphabet. Choose one of the letters and color it with a magic brush and paints. Then complete the picture with her image with drawings of objects that begin with this letter. Color all the pictures and save on your computer a wonderful handmade alphabet.

item.title: Easter Egg Search
item.description: This wonderful game perfectly develops memory and ingenuity. On the screen are reversed cards hiding images of cute animals. You need to sequentially open the pictures, trying to find pairs that match each other in meaning. If you choose the wrong card, the cards will return to their original position.

item.title: Easter Hunt
item.description: If you want a quiet entertainment and at the same time exercise logic and attention, then the game Mahjong Connect Pairs is quite suitable for these purposes. And don’t let the second part of the title fool you. You will have to connect not lovers, but the same, that is, paired chips. They can be in the same row next to each other or at a distance. Unlike the classic Mahjong, here it is not necessary that the chips have two sides open.

item.title: Easter Jigsaw 1
item.description: Children’s educational game invites you to the ski track. It is necessary to help the skier make the longest possible jump. To do this, you need to correctly solve several examples. Before starting the game, choose which mathematical operation you like best: addition, subtraction, multiplication or division.

item.title: Easter Mahjongg
item.description: The game process for girls Mahjong is based on the classic Chinese game of the same name. The goal is to clear the board of all chips. This toy is very similar to solitaire. But unlike the Asian version, here various delicacies are drawn on the knuckles. You need to find two identical drawings to remove them from the field. However, nothing will come of it if the chip is closed on two or more sides.

item.title: Eater Egg Hunt
item.description: Help the Easter bunny to cope with the invasion of eggs. They rise from below in the form of a wall of elements of different colors. You need to swap eggs, making combinations of four or more identical pieces. After that they will disappear. You need to act as quickly as possible so that in the end the wall does not grow too high.

item.title: EG Block Puzzle
item.description: The hardest in the world 4

item.title: Eg Neon Rider
item.description: The game has the ability to choose a multiplayer mode or play alone. In any case, you will have to drive a funny jeep, collect stars, but also invest in the standard. Each stage has its own standard. If you invest, you will go to the next level, if not, try again. In addition to dynamics and drive, the game will delight you with bright graphics.

item.title: Eg Zombies War
item.description: Stunning graphics and a simple plot - these are the two main features of this dynamic shooter. Imagine that you are alone, in an abandoned park, where crowds of hungry and aggressive mutants roam. Your task is not to turn into their today’s dinner, shooting back from the zombies with all your might.

item.title: Eggy Car
item.description: An interesting game in which you have to drive an unusual car with huge wheels and a powerful engine. It is necessary to win in street races, deftly managing this maneuverable monster. Competitions take place on the most ordinary city streets. Focus on the map so as not to get lost in the intricacies of streets and roads.

item.title: Ellie Get Ready With Me 2
item.description: The girl is going to a party, and you need to help her with this. First, go with the heroine of the game to a beauty salon to carry out various useful procedures and get rid of some troubles with the skin of the face. Then you will need to take care of makeup and outfit in which the girl will outshine everyone at the party.

item.title: Elsa Rock Vs Hip Hop
item.description: The girls decided to create their own musical group, and you need to help them become famous. The game consists of several levels, and on each of them the heroines must demonstrate their talents. Click on the buttons, the symbols of which are displayed above the head of each girl, to get reward points. Progress is displayed on the scale in the form of a disk.

item.title: Elsa Valentine Day Diary
item.description: Help the girl get ready for Valentine’s Day. The heroine of the game wants to get a chic outfit that her lover will like. You need to dress up the girl, choosing every detail of the dress and their color. You can also change the hairstyle and dye your hair to make the look even more original.

item.title: Elsa Vs Ariel Fashion Competition
item.description: In this business simulation game for girls you have to work in a store that sells winter outfits. Customers who want to buy cute things constantly come here. You need to listen to the customers and offer them what they want. At each level, you need to earn a specified amount of money.

item.title: Emergency Surgery
item.description: Princess Anna, the heroine of the famous animated film “Frozen Heart”, noticed that she began to hear badly. She turned to the royal hospital for help. Carefully examine your patient, determine what is causing the deterioration of her hearing and carry out the manipulations necessary to clean the ear from pathogenic microbes.

item.title: Energon Rally Game
item.description: The Autobots, along with Opitmus Prime, decided to have some fun and staged a racing competition outside the city. As you know, each of them can take the form of a cool and fast car. Choose one of the transformers to drive and start the race. There are only 10 levels in the game, start from the first and go through them all, reaching the finish line first.

item.title: Epic Robot Battle
item.description: The game Transformers undercover robots allows you to once again immerse yourself in the world of Autobots and Decepticons. You will play only on the side of the Autobots, but you can choose one of three characters at the very beginning of the game. Its essence lies in the fights between robots. Of course, according to the laws of the genre, you will have to fight with the Decepticons. Enemies are determined randomly.

item.title: Epic Robot Tournament
item.description: Killer Robot 2 will appeal to all, without exception, fans of action games. Try to go from beginning to end all the corridors of the abandoned space station, where you were dropped off for reconnaissance. On your way you will meet a huge number of dangerous enemies, deadly traps and obstacles. Destroying the encountered opponents, you will receive new types of weapons and cash to improve the performance of your combat bot.

item.title: Equestria Girls First Day At School
item.description: During the game Pony Equestria you will be asked to create a variety of compositions with the participation of cartoon horses. To do this, choose one location from Equestria, where the ponies will have fun, and then add various elements there: cakes, other goodies, territory decorations. Selected parts can be rotated and resized. As a result, you should get a nice picture that you can even print. If the way some object looks doesn’t suit you, then you can always delete it by clicking on the eraser.

item.title: Equestria Girls Graduation Party
item.description: If you love cartoons about cute horses, then you will definitely like the process of playing Pony Equestria Girls. You can even upload your own photo, and then arrange it in the style of a cartoon. This will allow you to admire yourself as one of the girls of fabulous Equestria. If you donât want to upload a photo, then itâs quite possible to choose one of the heroines, and then come up with a new image for her.

item.title: Exotic Animals Jigsaw
item.description: In this game you will find exciting puzzles dedicated to various animals. Just connect the pieces together to end up with a given picture. The finished image as a hint is displayed on the right side of the screen, which greatly simplifies your life. The toy consists of a large number of tasks-puzzles!

item.title: Extreme Bikers
item.description: While playing Horror Stories for the night, you find yourself in a small village whose inhabitants are suffering from an invasion of zombies that have suddenly appeared in an old cemetery. Help the unfortunate townspeople escape from the fate of being eaten and destroy all the monsters walking around the suburbs. Using a six-shot revolver, shoot the monsters in each of the locations of the horror story. Be careful, each of the evil dead is able to kill you, while the game will end immediately and you will have to start its passage from the beginning.

item.title: Extreme Cardboard Racing
item.description: The famous cartoon character Tsypa decided to take up motorsport, bought himself a sports car and went on a trip. Help the little chicken get back home by overcoming all the obstacles that await him on the way. Thanks to your help, the cute racer will have a great time, and at the same time he will test his sports car for strength.

item.title: Ez Mahjong
item.description: The game will appeal to active users, because instead of incomprehensible hieroglyphs, instead of incomprehensible hieroglyphs, the logos of programs for modern computers are drawn on it. As for the passage, here, as in the classic Chinese fun, you need to find the same chips in the layout, select them with a mouse click and remove them from the field. Time is unlimited.

item.title: Fairy Triple Mahjong
item.description: If you enjoy playing classic Chinese mahjong, you’ve come to the right place. For those who are not in the know, the rules are simple: you need to find two identical chips and remove them from the field by selecting them with the mouse. Each piece must have at least one free side. Before the start of the mono, choose the option of passing: normal or for a while.

item.title: Falling Ice Creams Match
item.description: Logic games for children 5 years old will help you develop spatial thinking and quick wits. Try to complete the sequence of items correctly. The screen will display three pictures and free space for the fourth. This is where you need to drag one of the four images located at the bottom of the screen. If you make the right decision, the picture will fall into place, after which a new logical task will open.

item.title: Fancy Birds Puzzle
item.description: Play an exciting game with funny birds. You need to swap feathered characters in order to get combinations of three or more identical individuals. Such combinations of birds will disappear. The task is to Crazy Games the specified number of points. Try to act fast.

item.title: Farm Mahjong
item.description: If you need a toy that develops logical thinking and attention for the smallest gamers, then you have a very suitable option. Users need to find chips with paired images and remove them from the screen. The drawings are very simple and all dedicated to the theme of pets. So it will be easy for children to work with them.

item.title: Fast Burger
item.description: The McDonald’s Simulator game invites you to play the role of a fast food restaurant manager. So you can see for yourself how difficult the process is. Starting to play, you have to control all stages of the production of hamburgers. You, as a leader, must see everything, hear everything and imagine step by step how to quickly and efficiently perform this or that work.

item.title: Fat Shark
item.description: Control an incredible shark that is ready to devour everyone who gets in its way. Your task is to deal with ships, planes and other objects, getting reward points for it. Don’t forget to destroy people and fish as well. If you grab a plane, you will have to work hard to pull it under the water.

item.title: Feed The Frog
item.description: frog simulator

item.title: Fighter Aircraft
item.description: While playing Airport and Planes you will get an idea of ââhow a small airport works. You will have to make decisions on the order of landing of aircraft. There are many aircraft in the air, and there are only two runways. It is necessary to calculate everything in such a way that the cars do not interfere with each other when landing and do not collide in the air.

item.title: Fighting Planes
item.description: You are entrusted with a special task - to control a powerful military fighter, to destroy enemy military equipment. You have to complete a series of missions, each of which will be an order of magnitude more difficult than the previous one. Help is nowhere to be found. You have to rely only on yourself and your aircraft. Shoot accurately, don’t be afraid of sharp turns and try not to get hit by enemy bullets.

item.title: Find Differences Bunny
item.description: An excellent game Hares invites you to help a cartoon character - Bugs Bunny the rabbit. He needs to get as high as possible by jumping on the platforms that appear in different places. Try to make jumps as accurately as possible so as not to fall down, and avoid birds flying past the rabbit.

item.title: Fire and Water Geometry Dash
item.description: A very interesting game for two, in which you will need to make your way up the platforms, collecting bonuses along the way and trying your best not to die. After all, if the Fire falls into a large lake of water, it will go out. Just like Water can not get into the lava, because it can evaporate. Move simultaneously along the intended path, helping each other.

item.title: Fireboy & Watergirl 3 In The Ice Temple
item.description: All that is required of you in this game is to overcome a certain distance with the main character in the minimum amount of time. In this case, it is desirable to collect as many coins as possible and not fall into the abyss. During the movement, do not be lazy to collect various useful things, ranging from magical shields to a talisman that turns the heroine invisible.

item.title: Fireboy & Watergirl 3 In The Ice Temple
item.description: The game for two Fireboy and Watergirl invites you to meet funny characters who went to explore the temple. The boy-fire and the girl-water got into a multi-level room filled with various dangers. You need to move around the location, avoiding traps. For example, water should never enter orange water bodies. They are full of lava, and the water girl will immediately evaporate. In order to overcome difficult places, it is proposed to use various mechanisms.

item.title: Fireboy & Watergirl In The Forest Temple
item.description: Inseparable little friends, a girl-water and a boy-light, went in search of treasures in the forest kingdom, where they found themselves in a mysterious forest temple.
