To fully explore this unusual structure and find as many treasures as possible, they will have to work hard. And you will help the heroes to realize their plans.

item.title: Fireboy & Watergirl In The Forest Temple
item.description: The game Fireboy and Watergirl in the Forest Temple invites you to go on an incredible journey. Here is a huge number of locations, to the eyeballs stuffed with dangers and traps. You need to bring the characters to the exit, which leads to the next stage. At the same time, each hero in the forest temple is assigned his own door with the corresponding icon. You just need to get closer to it, after which the doors will swing open, and the heroes will go to the next stage of the game.

item.title: Fireboy & Watergirl In The Light Temple
item.description: Controlling the character, you need to go through a little training before you boldly rush towards the test. Learn to jump, run fast and, most importantly, have time to collect glowing balls. And with the points earned and collected bonuses, you can visit the store, where it will be possible to purchase armor for the hero and replenish his health.

item.title: Fireboy and Watergirl 4 The Crystal Temple
item.description: Help your friends - fire and water - get out of the mysterious temple. To do this, you have to go through a large number of levels. Each of them has a unique location full of various obstacles. Please note that there are a large number of portals here that allow the heroes to teleport.

item.title: Fireboy and Watergirl 5 Elements
item.description: Fire and water hit the temple, which consisted of a huge number of rooms. Your task is to help the characters go through all the locations. The levers and buttons will help you with this, activate them to open the passages. Beware of water bodies, because they can harm the heroes of the game if the colors do not match.

item.title: Fish Coloring Book
item.description: In this game you have to help a fisherman catch fish for making sushi. Dip the bait with pre-prepared bait under the water so that the fish can swallow it and get hooked. Note that different fish respond to different baits. Choose the most suitable for a big catch.

item.title: Fish Mahjon
item.description: No, this is not a special mahjong for sailors. In the marine style, there are only drawings on the chips. Well, and the background of the entire image. By the way, thanks to him, the game is great for relaxing after work. Otherwise, everything is as usual: find and remove chips with the same pictures. The time for passing is limited to forty minutes. You can include a pause.

item.title: Fish Master
item.description: Great game about fishing with a float rod. Cast your tackle and wait for the fish to take the bait. For every fish you catch, you get a lot of money. The casting force can be controlled by the indicator on the right side of the screen using the mouse. Earned coins to spend on new gear and bait.

item.title: Fishing
item.description: According to the terms of the game Catch Fish, you start your way in business as an ordinary fisherman. Stock up on a fishing rod and go to the pond to catch a couple of fish for lunch. As soon as you have more prey than you need for food, you can sell it at special outlets. You have to manage your own markups to secure a suitable profit. It’s easy enough to play.

item.title: Fishing Game
item.description: Aquarium Fish game invites you to show your creativity. Here you can create your own pretty aquarium by choosing the right decorative details. The game presents an assortment of houses for fish, algae, pebbles, and decorations. Do not forget to put a fish in the aquarium and, for example, a crab or a starfish.

item.title: Fishing Jigsaw
item.description: This puzzle game invites you to sink to the bottom of the world’s oceans and admire the picturesque scenery of one of the coral reefs. Try to assemble the whole puzzle as quickly as possible from a huge number of separate pieces, because there is a competition among the participants of this game, and the best results will be posted on the developers’ website.

item.title: Fishing Trip
item.description: The game Fishing 2015 is not a full-fledged simulator of the fishing process, but it can bring a lot of interesting and exciting minutes. At the competitions of famous anglers, you have to prove your skills and catch the right amount of fish in the allotted time, which is quite difficult. Try to lower the hook just in front of the fish’s mouth - then it will definitely bite, and you can pull it out.

item.title: Flower Slide Mahjong
item.description: The Butterfly Mahjong game is one of the variants of the popular puzzle game, which is laid out on the table not in the form of a pyramid, but in one plane. The rules, however, do not change in this case - only tiles located at the edges work. They depict halves of beautiful butterflies, and if you find paired fragments, they will connect, and the whole butterfly will fly away.

item.title: Flower Tower Mahjong
item.description: A very beautiful and well-known mahjong logic game “Flowerland” will appeal to all lovers of puzzles. You will find a huge number of different colors on the screen. Similar images need to be removed. A little time is allocated for the passage, but for each pair found, you are added a few seconds.

item.title: Flowers Rush
item.description: In this game you find yourself in a huge flower field. At each stage you have to collect a beautiful bouquet of wildflowers. Making bouquets of three or more flowers, try to break all the prize cells on the field as quickly as possible. There is a limited time to collect a beautiful bouquet, so hurry up and complete the task of each level as quickly as possible.

item.title: Fluttershy Pony Dress Up
item.description: If you like the animated series about cute horses, then you will also like the process of playing My Little Pony for two. Her main character is Princess Twilight Sparkle, who is going to have a real pillow fight. Just click on any place on the screen, after which the pillow will strike the horse. You can fight as you like, watching the reaction of the pony and enjoying such a fun activity.

item.title: Flying Truck Racer
item.description: In this game you are waiting for rides on one of the proposed high-speed cars. You choose it first, and then the game mode: multiplayer or single. In a multiplayer game there will be other gamers and most likely foreign ones. You can arrange races with them, or you can just ride and stunt on flyovers.

item.title: Food Hidden Stars
item.description: In this game you will need maximum attention and observation. You have to look for the stars hidden in the picture. But during the day, such searches are very difficult. You have only 5 minutes to complete the task, and you can earn bonus points if you meet this time. In total, you need to find 40 stars.

item.title: Football Coloring Book
item.description: Summer coloring for kids will show you a black and white picture of funny octopuses enjoying a walk. It is proposed to color this cute picture using any of the colors offered on the screen. You will find all available colors at the bottom of it. There are really a lot of them here! Therefore, the image of summer will turn out to be bright and attractive. Click on the selected color, and then click on the area you are going to color.

item.title: Football Coloring Time
item.description: Coloring for children The ball is not as simple as it might seem from the name. Firstly, the ball itself is a soccer ball, which allows you to paint in its parts in separate colors. Secondly, in addition to the ball, the picture also shows a football player kicking it - this is a kitten that resembles the hero of some cartoon. You also need to make it colorful.

item.title: Freddys Escape House
item.description: At the very beginning, you can register on the official website and then take part in the online multiplayer game. But you can also play as a guest. In this case, it is possible to compete with a friend who will control the second game character from the same keyboard as you. The point is to run with obstacles. Side view. You have to run through the forest.

item.title: Frenzied Cube
item.description: At any time of the day, you can play for free (until you get bored) the fantastically popular online project Geometry Dash 4 in the world. A typical platformer awaits on the screen. The bottom line is that the cube slides from left to right, to the transition to the next level (by the way, the coolest one is 4), and you must prevent it from colliding with obstacles and traps.

item.title: Frogtastic
item.description: While playing Zuma Deluxe 2, you will have to take part in an exciting competition, where you will have to show maximum attention and good reaction. Try not to miss a single ball from the multi-colored Zuma chains into the central hole. Knock them out online for free using a cannon with colored charges. Complete all levels of the game and prove that you are one of the best Zuma players.

item.title: Frolic Car Parking
item.description: A game with weird graphics and car rendering. Otherwise, there is almost nothing original in it. Just drive your car along the arrows, collect bonuses and look for a parking spot. There is not so much fantastic here, but there is. For example, transitions between parking levels. The game has a time limit, so there is no time to stare at the sights.

item.title: Fruit Escape
item.description: Educational games for children 8 years old offer to solve exciting puzzles. You need to pour water through pipes from one vessel to another. At the same time, the allowable volume is marked on each of them. It is necessary to arrange the proposed elements in such a way that not a drop of water spills past, and all of it flows through the pipes.

item.title: Fruit Farm
item.description: Harvesting is taking place in a fairyland, and you have to help its inhabitants to collect as many wonderful fruits as possible. Using a small platform, try to transfer the fruits falling from the tree into a huge basket. Carefully watch the flight of each of the fruits and try to make sure that not one of them falls to the ground.

item.title: Fruit Mahjong
item.description: A funny, but very gluttonous caterpillar decided to eat all the fruits in the garden. She asks you for help. In order for the fruits to get into the stomach of a cute glutton, you must find all the same fruits on the playing field. As soon as a match is found, it immediately becomes the dinner of a green baby who dreams of becoming a butterfly someday.

item.title: Fruit Master 1
item.description: The Fruit Ninja game invites fans of stories about the elusive Eastern warriors to play. But this time there will be no bloody fights, harassment and other adventures. Today you will hone your skills with a samurai sword. The essence of the Fruit Ninja game is simple: you need to cut flying fruits and vegetables in half. You can play by choosing one of three difficulty levels. Start with the simplest.

item.title: Fruit Match samename 1
item.description: The Fruit Cocktail game invites you to a farm where all kinds of fruits are grown. Try to collect as many of them as possible in a limited period of time. To do this, you need to make lines of three or more identical fruits. Prize points are awarded for each collected chain.

item.title: Funny Bunny Logic
item.description: In this game you have to work in a bar located in the forest. Bunnies constantly come here, wanting to drink delicious juice. Carefully follow the orders of visitors and fulfill them exactly, choosing the right berries and glasses. For fast and correct execution you will receive money.

item.title: Funny Math
item.description: The presented educational games for children aged 8-9 allow not only to have a great time, but also to practice mathematical skills. Here you will find yourself on a pirate island, where you need to move around the locations and collect various items. In addition, you need to solve the given example and find the numbers of the answer.

item.title: Galactic Cop
item.description: In the game Astronauts you have to control two brothers who decided to go into space to find new planets and make the most accurate star map. Who would have thought that terrible dangers await them, and the guys will have to make a lot of joint efforts to overcome obstacles. The heroes cannot cope together, they need a coordinator. The game invites you to help the brave astronauts in their difficult journey.

item.title: Galactic Gems 2
item.description: Welcome to the fantastic world of magic and runes! In this game you have to control five magical elements. Collect runes of one of the elements in chains of three or more. Put together as much magical energy as you can, and through it, try to learn the most secret techniques of ancient magic.

item.title: Garbage Trucks Coloring
item.description: Refresh the design of this boring truck. Use all the available paints to get creative and create some cool options. You can depict on board the logo of some trading company or just a multi-colored rainbow. You also have the opportunity to decorate the road and nearby buildings. Make the picture bright and colorful.

item.title: Garden Tales
item.description: In this wonderful game you find yourself in a beautiful garden. At each of its stages it is necessary to grow a magnificent flower. Try to collect chains of cards depicting different types of flowers presented in the most unique botanical garden. Do it as quickly as possible, because the plant must be grown in a limited time.

item.title: Geo Dash
item.description: Gambling online platformer “Geometry Dash: Cube Adventures” consists of 21 levels of varying difficulty. At the start of the game, they all open for free and immediately. But, if you have never played Geometry Dash up to this point, it is better to start the passage from the beginning, gradually moving towards the end. The main character is a cartoon cube, running through a location full of all sorts of obstacles.

item.title: Geometry Dash Horror
item.description: The locations of the online game “Geometry Dash: Dungeon Escape” are a gloomy, confusing labyrinth. Its numerous corridors are littered with traps, like a hedgehog with needles. It’s worth hitting even one when the game is over. The task of the gamer is to help the main character, the cube, escape from the gloomy place to freedom. To do this, you need to find the yellow door - the transition to the next stage.

item.title: Geometry Dash Jump
item.description: The protagonist of the gambling online arcade - a black ball, goes in search of treasures. You can keep him company for free. The game location looks like an ancient Indonesian temple with a lot of artifacts. The task of the character is to collect as many of them as possible. The difficulty is that the ancient monks, leaving their native monastery, set up many traps inside it. It is necessary to please one, and the game will immediately end.

item.title: Geometry Jump
item.description: He prepared the biggest difficulties for users when passing the online project “Geometry Dash” level 5. If you’re a weakling, it will make your eyes bleed. Only users with steel ropes instead of nerves and ultra-modern mice are able to overcome everything that the game will present them. By the way, access to it is provided for free. When you start playing, you will understand that it’s not about geometry, but about your reaction.

item.title: Geometry Neon Dash Subzero
item.description: The online project “Geometry dash subzero” quickly became popular. Schoolchildren around the world are fighting for the right to play it, but only you can do it for free. Be proud and download.

item.title: Geometry Neon Dash World 2
item.description: Geometry Dash: Neon Jump is a new addition to the Geometry Dash series of gambling platform games. To go through it to the end, you will need attentiveness. Use the mouse to control. Press her left button every time the main character - a cartoon cube, there will be some kind of obstacle. It will be difficult to play because the terrain of locations is changing all the time. Just get used to the horizontal passage, as it will be replaced by a vertical movement from the bottom up.

item.title: Geometry Rush
item.description: The gameplay of the online game “Geometry Dash for Girls” is no different from the same arcade games for boys. Unless the design of the location is brighter. You have to play in exactly the same way: by clicking the mouse in time, help the cartoon cube to overcome obstacles for free. Passage includes two dozen levels. First, the main character moves on the ground, and then soars into the air on a small painted rocket.

item.title: Gladiators
item.description: The game Gladiators takes you to the time of the Roman Empire and offers you to compete with other players, managing a squad of brave warriors participating in various tournaments. Lead a school of gladiators by recruiting different types of fighters: horsemen, archers and charioteers. An online game about gladiators allows you to enjoy spectacular, exciting battles, participate in various tournaments and championships, winning money and fame. Develop your school, unlock new opportunities and fight for control of the empire.

item.title: Go Robots
item.description: Optimus Prime sent one of his motorbots deep into the depths of Antarctica, where he needs to find nine parts from a long-lost superdrill. Help the brave hero of this game to get through the snowy mountains, collect the maximum number of energy cubes and find all the parts of the drill.

item.title: Go Robots 2
item.description: The robot-hero and savior of the galaxy unsuccessfully calculated the trajectory of his intergalactic flight, collided with one of the satellites and ended up on an unknown planet. Help a brave space explorer get to a small research base located in the depths of the planet. With the help of a huge alien flower, try to throw the android as close as possible to the rescue station.

item.title: Gobble Snake
item.description: The Maze game for kids invites you to have a great time in the company of Dasha the Traveler. This time you need to help her go through the corridors of the intricate labyrinth in order to find a way out of it. You only need a mouse to control it: you need to grab Dasha’s figure with the cursor and drag it to the finish line. In this case, you can not run into the walls of the corridors, so you will lose one game life.

item.title: Gold Mine
item.description: In this game you have to become a miner who is engaged in the extraction of precious nuggets. Try to correctly calculate the flight path of a special anchor with which you will draw gold. At each level of the game, you need to draw a certain number of nuggets in a limited time.

item.title: Gold Miner Bros
item.description: A famous gold miner discovered a small mine with huge deposits of the precious metal. He goes out to mine gold and invites you to join him. The old mine is fraught with a lot of dangers, in the tunnels through which your path will pass, collapses constantly occur. Try to use the special hook to pull out the gold nuggets before the tunnel collapses.

item.title: Goldblade
item.description: The plot of the adventure game Alice knows what to do is based on the well-known fairy tale about a girl who got into a strange parallel world. You are invited to help the heroine cope with all local difficulties and return home. Move around locations avoiding enemies. Of course, you can just jump on the enemy to destroy him. For this, Alice will receive bonus points. Don’t forget to collect coins that are just in the air or hidden in blocks with question marks.

item.title: Goldtrain FRVR
item.description: Transport strategy game is an exciting train driving simulator. Become the owner of the railways and decide for yourself where the train will go. In fact, at each stage of the game you will find a certain task, having coped with it, you can go to the next level.

item.title: Gone Fishing
item.description: Go fishing with a funny panda armed with a special fishing rod that sucks up fish. Take her to the river inhabitants and catch them to get money for it. Sometimes the device will fill up and then you need to clean it so that you can continue the exciting fishing.

item.title: Great Fishing
item.description: The game Summer Fishing will give true lovers of fishing great pleasure. Sit on your island and hook everything that moves. In addition to various fish, you can also catch watches to extend the level time and bait for other types of fish. The casting distance is controlled by the mouse.

item.title: Green Lake
item.description: The Ural fishing application to play for free will make you be patient and go to the pond in winter. The main thing is to dress warmly, because in this ice kingdom you will have to stay for a long time. The peculiarity of fishing is that it is impossible to predict where the fish is. Only experienced anglers can determine the location of a likely bite. Drill a hole and watch your fishing rod.

item.title: GTA Hidden Keys
item.description: During the game GTA 9 you will work for one of the mafia groups. Go by car to the other end of the city and take the contraband from the merchants. As long as you are driving “empty”, no one will touch you, but as soon as the goods are loaded into the car, the police will begin the pursuit. Your task is to deliver the cargo to its destination, breaking away from the chase at any cost.

item.title: GTA Motorbikes
item.description: The GTA game for boys gives you the opportunity to turn into a virtual criminal for a while. The task is quite simple - to rob shops and banks. Park the car in the indicated place and do not draw attention to yourself during the operation. Well, after the robbery, get as far away from the crime scene as you can by flying forward along the fast lane.

item.title: GTA Puzzle Challenge
item.description: The main difference between the game for girls GTA is that you are not a villain and a bandit, but a kind policeman who is entrusted with a responsible mission. There are many different and interesting tasks to complete. A person is missing - you need to urgently get into the car and look for him. Just be careful on the road. Don’t interfere with other GTA traffic participants.

item.title: Gummy Blocks
item.description: In order to win this toy, you have to remove all colored cubes from the playing field. Use the mouse cursor to point to chains of three or more cubes of the same color, and they will disappear. Try to find and destroy chains of cubes as quickly as possible, because every second more and more new cubes appear on the playing field.

item.title: Gun Masters
item.description: Kids games for boys 7 years old will make you feel like a real toy picker. This game consists of several levels, and on each of them you will see the assembly scheme, as well as various parts from which the toy should eventually turn out. Please note that there may be extra parts.

item.title: Habbo Clicker
item.description: The new strategy game Oligarch Business gives you the opportunity to build a global oil company. Explore new deposits, negotiate with buyers and supply black gold to all countries of the world. Master new branches of production, open branches and attract customers with tempting advertising.

item.title: Halloween 2018 Jigsaw
item.description: In this game you have to assemble a picture of an autumn road from separate pieces. Carefully inspect each of the puzzle pieces and try to place it correctly on the electronic easel. By combining all the elements, you can fully enjoy the picturesque landscape.

item.title: Halloween Car Jigsaw
item.description: Interesting and useful logic games for children 7 years old will allow you to have a great time solving puzzles. In them, you need to continue a series of several items, choosing one suitable from four options. The game has two modes: easy and hard. On a simple one, you can make an infinite number of mistakes, but on a complex one, you can only make a mistake twice in all the time.

item.title: Halloween Coloring Book
item.description: Tell your friends about a fun Halloween holiday with the help of pictures with images of the characters participating in it. And in order to more vividly convey the meaning of the celebration, try to make these drawings as colorful and bright as possible. Choose the right color from the palette with the help of a virtual brush, making full use of your skills as an artist.

item.title: Halloween Pizzeria
item.description: This small pizzeria is the most popular place among urban youth. Every day, dozens of students and students come here to enjoy pizza prepared according to the best Italian recipes. Together with Chef Horatio, you need to feed all the young people, fulfilling the orders on time, which will be displayed in a cloud above the head of each client.

item.title: Hanger
item.description: During the game Drunken Spiderman you have to help Spiderman get out of the trap that Doctor Octopus set for him. Using a special chemical composition, the insidious villain managed to intoxicate the spider, and then shackle him in special chains that completely blocked his reflexes and abilities. Playing drunk Spider-Man is very difficult, because due to the action of the intoxicating drug, your character is almost unable to move.

item.title: Happy Crayons
item.description: The game for kids Coloring invites all lovers of creative pursuits to try their hand at creating a cute picture. On the screen you will see an image of a cute cat, and you will need to color it. To do this, choose any shade from the proposed palette, and then click on the area of ââthe screen that should become colored. But coloring is not limited to coloring only!

item.title: Happy Glass Puzzle
item.description: In this game you have to fill bottles with water. But it won’t be easy to do so! Before you will be several vessels of different sizes, and the task will be presented in the upper part. It will tell you exactly how many liters of water and in which bottle you need to pour. As soon as you do this, a new level will open.

item.title: Harpoon Frvr
item.description: Fishing game 2015 will let you enjoy a truly realistic fishing experience. The gameplay of this cool simulator will be appreciated by both true fishing professionals and amateurs. After the launch, you will find beautiful lakes and rivers, a change of day and night, as well as many different tackles and lures.

item.title: Helicopter Parking And Racing Simulator
item.description: According to the rules of the game Airplane Flying Landing and Takeoff, you have to control a rescue transport helicopter. This heavy colossus is equipped with two propellers at once and is capable of carrying up to several tons of cargo. But your task is to save the tourists who got lost in the forest. The difficulty of landing and takeoff depends on the terrain and other factors. Therefore, it is better to immediately deal with the management.

item.title: Helicopters Puzzle Challenge
item.description: The authors of this toy tried to create a puzzle game simulator as close as possible to the original, and they succeeded. In the shortest possible time, try to assemble a wonderful picture from separate pieces. Move the pieces of the puzzle from place to place, pick up matching pieces with the mouse cursor.

item.title: Hero Clicker
item.description: A huge army of monsters broke into the vault of the sacred castle, in the bowels of which a huge battle crystal is hidden. You have to protect the gem from the monsters by destroying them with the mouse cursor. Each killed demon will feed the crystal and, at some point, the sacred artifact will wake up and throw all the monsters out of the borders of the fairy kingdom.

item.title: Hero In Super Action Adventure
item.description: All the kingdoms of the fairy-tale world are attacked by terrible monsters that absorb bright colors from all living things. Only the famous fox Windy can save the magical land from black and white slavery. Set off on a journey with a brave little girl, defeat an army of nightmarish monsters and return the paints they stole.

item.title: Heroes Of Myths Warriors Of Gods
item.description: In ancient times, the most valuable resource of human tribes was the territory, it was for it that the most bloody battles between tribes took place. And even when the winner was firmly established on any land, there was always a risk that someone would try to capture it. Your kingdom is already quite wealthy and ready to fend for itself. But you have to defend yourself from many invaders.

item.title: Hidden Christmas Cookies
item.description: There is a huge amount of food hidden in this restaurant. And you have to use your bow and arrows again to search for different goodies. Look carefully at the picture and try to find all the “edible” objects in the allotted time by sending arrows at them. Food can be not only on the tables, but also in other places that are not at all intended for food.

item.title: Hidden Jingle Bells
item.description: In the game you will have a great chance to test your powers of observation. Find all the letters in each level of this colorful game dedicated to your favorite fabulous holiday - New Year. Use your mouse to search. Try to avoid random clicks on empty space, because then your points will decrease. And remember, time is limited.

item.title: Hidjigs Game Christmas
item.description: Thanks to this toy, you will have the opportunity to prepare a greeting card that you can give to your friends for the New Year. To get started, choose an original story from a special book. After you decide on the layout, start coloring the black and white card. Try and make the best greeting card for your friends.

item.title: High Hills
item.description: During the game Car racing in the dirt you will find a unique competition on tracks that not every car will pass. But you got a unique racing car, on which you will definitely pass any obstacles. In addition to you, several other drivers are participating in the race, and you need to overtake all rivals in order to win and go to the next stage. Don’t forget to collect coins and other bonus items along the way.

item.title: Highschool Love Story
item.description: During the game for girls Makeup you have to turn into a real make-up artist. A pretty girl will appear on the screen, and it is her image that will need to be dealt with. Choose a hairstyle for the heroine, and then start applying makeup using a variety of decorative cosmetics. Here you will find shadows, and blush, and lipstick, and many other means. Also in the game it is proposed to choose an outfit for the girl and stylish accessories suitable for it.

item.title: Hit Or Knit
item.description: Logic games Shooters will show you a huge number of colorful balls. They lined up in a massive structure at the top of the screen. At the bottom there is a device that allows you to shoot all the same balls. Throw them into groups of elements of the same color to get rid of them. The toy is available online without restrictions.

item.title: Hitman Rush
item.description: German invaders roam the streets of your city, and you, like a true patriot, stood up for his defense. You have a machine gun, cartridges, grenades and a great desire to free the area from the enemy. Use the slightest cover to fire, collect first-aid kits that will allow you to restore health, and do not forget to pick up boxes of ammo in time.

item.title: Homemade Pizza Cooking
item.description: Almost everyone loves pizza. And now you have to cook a variety of pizzas using a variety of ingredients. It is necessary to rely on the order forms, adding to the dough all the components that are indicated there. Try not to make mistakes, because after a few mistakes the game will end. With each level, the tasks will become more difficult.

item.title: Horse Care And Riding
item.description: Animals game introduces you to the beautiful Cinderella and her pet - a wonderful dog. Together they went on a journey on a pumpkin carriage through the fairy kingdom. At one of the turns, the carriage fell apart, and the friends fell into a huge muddy puddle. During this animal game you have to help a girl and her shaggy friend clean up. First, take care of the puppy, remove all dirt and twigs from the dog, provide first aid and tidy up the coat, then help the unfortunate princess.

item.title: Horse Coloring Book
item.description: Start the process of the game Drawing a pony friendship is a miracle and invent your own horse, using all the available options for this. Change the color of the horse’s coat, choose the shape of the mane and tail, the color of the eyes, add all kinds of decorations. If desired, you can include wings or a horn in the pony image, or even both.

item.title: House Coloring Book
item.description: Online coloring pages for girls 3 years old will allow you to unleash your creativity. Choose one of the three pictures to work on. Then it remains only to use a felt-tip pen, choosing the appropriate shades. In addition, you can add cute flowers or hearts to the image for beauty.

item.title: How To Make Homemade Sugar Cookies
item.description: Macaroons are small, multi-colored, round cakes with a creamy filling, decorated with confetti, poppy seeds, powders and powders. Today with the help of this game you will learn how to cook this confectionery masterpiece. Beat the whites with powdered sugar, mix with almond flour, add dye, place circles on a baking sheet and into the oven.

item.title: I Am The Ninja 2
item.description: The main character is a tiny ninja. The enemies caught him and locked him in an abandoned monastery on a high mountain. The player’s task is to help the hero escape from prison for free. The difficulty is that only one narrow path leads to the valley from the monastery. The villains set deadly traps and barriers on her. You need to play so as not to get into any of them.

item.title: Ice Cream Bar
item.description: The game Daddy’s Ice Cream Shop sends you to one of the islands in the Pacific Ocean. There you will work in a cafe where each visitor is offered the most delicious ice cream on the island. Try to fulfill the orders of all the customers of the institution, and use the money received from them to develop a cozy cafe.

item.title: Ice Princess And Cute Parrot
item.description: The macaw parrot is a rather large bird with very bright plumage and a strong beak. In the game, you have to try to color the image of the bird with the help of a brush and the suggested jars of paint. The color outline of the picture will tell you exactly which shade you need to choose for coloring a particular fragment.

item.title: Ice Princess Twins Birth
item.description: A married couple who are expecting a child turned to one of the city’s maternity hospitals. Pregnant Lisa complains of strange pains and you have to accept her premature birth. To protect the future mother and her child, a complex operation is to be performed. Try to give Lisa a C-section as carefully as possible.

item.title: Ice Princess Wedding Day
item.description: After starting this game, you will meet a cute girl who is about to get married. Naturally, she wants to look her best. Your task is to create a perfect bridal look using any of the presented items of the wardrobe. Choose a dress, tiara, veil, shoes, jewelry.

item.title: Idle Fish
item.description: Become the owner of a virtual fish farm. After starting the game, a pond will appear in front of you, where you can settle a variety of fish. They will give caviar and other useful products that can be sold in the future. The process consists of a large number of levels, and on each you need to complete the given tasks.

item.title: Ill Billy
item.description: After starting the game Fish eat people, you will be asked to control a toothy shark. She is able not only to devour a fish or a person, but even to drag an airplane or helicopter under water. Your task is to Crazy Games as many reward points as possible. Move in water and air, eat everything you see.

item.title: Impossible Lite Dash
item.description: The online game “Geometry Dash: Light” differs from other arcade games in the series by the unusual vertical structure of the location. The main character - a square with eyes, moves across the screen not from left to right, as usual, but from bottom to top. The player’s task is to direct the character’s movements so that he can quickly get out of the deep mine. Use the mouse to control.

item.title: Instagirls Dress Up
item.description: A university graduate got a job at a well-known law office. Help the girl pick out some business suits for work. Choose the necessary things from the beauty’s wardrobe and create some stylish sets. Do not forget to make a suitable hairstyle that will emphasize her beauty.

item.title: Jelly Friends
item.description: During the game for preschool children, the smallest fans of computer entertainment will be able to participate in an exciting competition. Try to guess which is colder. The authors offer several test questions that you must answer by choosing one of two pictures. The toy pleases with beautiful design, as well as wonderful musical effects. Each of the questions is duplicated by the announcer, which helps the baby to make the right choice.

item.title: Jewel Blocks
item.description: This game is an analogue of the well-known Tetris, but in it you will face a slightly different task. It is necessary to build the highest possible tower, using elements that fall from above. They can be flipped to find the most suitable and stable position.

item.title: Jewel Hunt
item.description: Scientists of the ancient Mayan civilization invite you to take part in an exciting competition. Try to go through as many stages of this exciting game as possible, scoring the maximum number of bonus points on each of them. To do this, you need to collect lines of gems of the same color.

item.title: Jewel Magic Xmas
item.description: While playing mini games of logic Poki you go to a fantastic planet in a distant solar system. In one of the deep gorges, scouts have discovered a strange station, and you need to unravel the access code to it. Try to open all the squares on the playing field by collecting chains of three or more stones in a limited time.

item.title: Jigsaw Puzzle Flowers
item.description: The Flower puzzle game will require you to be attentive and have excellent logical thinking. You have to collect wonderful photos depicting beautiful flowers from separate pieces. The authors of the game offer players two modes: in one of them you have to collect puzzles for a while, and in the second, enjoy the unhurried collection of magnificent pictures.

item.title: Jungle Connect
item.description: Destroy the tiles, with the same images printed on them, in pairs. You can remove no more than two identical pictures from the field at a time. The selected tiles must be open on three sides: right, left and top. A simple layout option is available for amateurs and a timed game for professionals.

item.title: Jungle Hidden Animals
item.description: Mystical events took place in the safari park. All animals are gone. You will have to find them thanks to the magnifying glass that moves across the screen with the mouse. You will see images of animals that you need to find under the picture. There you will also find a hint that will be valid for a certain number of points Crazy Gamesd.

item.title: Kids Coloring Time
item.description: Do you like to draw and color? Then you will definitely like this game. Here it is proposed to work on a black-and-white image dedicated to the fairy tale “Ryaba the Hen”. At the bottom of the screen are all available colors, click on them with a brush to be able to use the selected color.

item.title: Kindergarten Dress Up
item.description: The game Kindergarten in Russian offers free to play for everyone. In it you can turn into a real nanny who brings small children to look after. Your task is to take care of the kids, fulfilling all their desires. Keep a close eye on each child, tracking his behavior. Children may want to eat, sleep, play. Sometimes you have to change the diaper, after washing the baby - everything is like in a real kindergarten.

item.title: King Fishing
item.description: The evil doctor caught all the fish and locked them in boxes to be sent to the laboratory. Help the brave rescuers free them in two minutes. The gameplay is an improved variation of the classic arkanoid, only instead of tiles there are funny fish that you need to hit with a ball and catch when they pop up.

item.title: King Of Fishing
item.description: In this game, you will control a powerful shark that sows destruction and death around. Move underwater to devour all oncoming fish and scuba divers. Jump into the air to grab a helicopter or other object that can bring you more reward points. Destroy as many vehicles as possible and eat people.

item.title: Kiss Cat
item.description: Go to the Wild West immediately after the launch of Shooting games for kids 5 years old. There you have to be in the shoes of a cowboy and fight the bad guys. They will attack from all sides, you just have to shoot at everyone in time. After each round, it will be possible to upgrade weapons.

item.title: Kitty Care And Grooming
item.description: Surely, many were looking for something like a game for girls caring for animal kittens, dogs, rats, frogs in which the main topic is. We recommend that you consider this option. Here, two kittens will bathe each other, imitating the cries of a human child when something goes wrong. If the sound hits the nerves a lot, you can turn off the sound.

item.title: Knife Hit Horror
item.description: A huge crowd of the resurrected dead is moving towards the city. It is up to you to save its inhabitants from terrible zombies. Quickly start this difficult mission, try to survive and destroy all the monsters. Set up towers with automatic guns, launch airstrikes - do whatever comes to mind, but don’t let the zombies into the city.

item.title: Knife Shooter
item.description: Use the cannon to launch the ball and try to get it into the basket. Choose the inclination of the barrel and the strength of the shot with the mouse on a special scale. Each new level will be more difficult than the previous one. Obstacles will appear on the field that need to be destroyed or bypassed. The more accurate your throws are, the more points you earn.

item.title: Ladybug Glittery Makeup
item.description: During the game for two Makeup, two pretty girls appear on the screen in front of you. They are preparing for the school ball and can not put themselves in order. Help the beauties apply shadows, tint lips and blush cheeks. Then you need to pick up fashionable hairstyles for your girlfriends and try on ball gowns.

item.title: Lamborghini Coloring Book
item.description: An ice cream company decided to paint their cars in original colors. Representatives of the company organized a competition. The winner will receive a small reward and the opportunity to come up with a design for Volkswagen transporters. Try to create an original coloring for your car and win this competition.

item.title: Legendary Warrior Globin Rush
item.description: Game Goblins war of clans tells about the great confrontation between individual families in the country of the ancient Vikings. As the leader of one of them, you will have to think over a strategy to protect your possessions. Create your own army and earn experience to gain skills and magical powers to repel enemy attacks.

item.title: Light It Up Online
item.description: You have to get rid of all the bad guys in the new shooting game from the Stickman adventure series “Headhunter”. Upgrade your weapons, get grenades and armor in between missions, trying to defeat enemies at all levels of the game. Remember to reload regularly using the R key and take cover in time.

item.title: Line Puzzle Artist
item.description: Mind games for children 7 years old will make you rack your brains over puzzles, the conditions of which are laid out against the background of the starry sky. Here you will need to unravel the shape so that none of its lines intersect the others. With each figure, the task will become more difficult, more and more lines will be used in the composition.

item.title: Little Cat Doctor
item.description: Tigers are big and strong animals. But until they grow up, they need care. So your task is to provide the tiger cub with everything it needs. In the upper left corner of the screen are images of various objects. For example, milk bottles. By clicking on it, you will be taken to another screen, where you will need to hold down the mouse button on the animal so that the bar on top is filled.

item.title: Little Dentist
item.description: In this game you have to play the role of a doctor who is able to cope with any problems. This time the patient complains about his teeth. He was playing baseball and got hit in the jaw. Your task is to examine the boy and carry out all the necessary procedures that will help the patient.

item.title: Little Dino Adventure
item.description: The Dino game will be very popular with small users because of the main character. After all, this is the same dinosaur from a box of children’s lactic acid dessert. Management, however, can cause difficulty for kids. First, it is carried out using the keyboard. Secondly, it is quite difficult to deal with opponents. By the way, the character in the story went on a campaign. He has to jump over the abyss and deal with enemies.

item.title: Lord Of The Knights
item.description: The game is as simple as a pine board! You choose a character: archer-man or archer-woman. All. You are standing on the right side of the screen in the outfit of an English archer, and on the left you are being attacked by enemies. Apparently, these are some kind of Saracens. If they reach your character, they will start slashing very quickly with a sword and then it will be over.

item.title: Love Balls
item.description: In this game you will find interesting puzzles with the participation of colorful balls. There are several levels, and on each of them a circle filled with balls will be displayed on the screen. There is also a pattern by which you need to reproduce the order of the balls. Rotate them until you achieve your goal.

item.title: Love Balls 2
item.description: Help the character of this game to meet his beloved. You will find a huge number of levels, on each of which you need to get to the bench where the girl is sitting. Overcome various obstacles, collect sweets and turn the world around if necessary. With each stage, the game becomes more difficult.

item.title: Love Bears
item.description: Entertaining games for children 8 years old offer you to help a little bird who really needs to get to his birdhouse. Guide the feathered heroine through the intricate labyrinth so that she can finally return home. Arrow buttons are used to control the cute bird.

item.title: Magic Easter Tiles
item.description: In this game you have to help a little bird. The screen displays moving notes, which sequentially fall into the screen frame. You need to quickly tap on the corresponding note at the bottom of the screen to lock the symbol. If you make mistakes too often, trouble will happen to the bird.

item.title: Magic Zoo
item.description: In this game, you and the main character go to the zoo for an excursion. There you meet a nasty monkey who throws stones at visitors. Together with your ward on the screen, try to throw stones at the nasty monkey, correctly calculating the trajectory of the flight, the force with which you must launch the projectile.

item.title: Magical Girl Save The School
item.description: A cute anime girl, the heroine of the game Robots for Girls 5, turned to your beauty salon with a huge request. Together with their friend - the iron man, they go to the carnival, and they just need new costumes. Come up with new images for your friends, thanks to which they will become the stars of the holiday.

item.title: Magical Pony Caring
item.description: The game was originally designed for girls, judging by the characters. However, it may be of interest to gamers of any gender and age. The goal is to keep the vital signs of the main characters (looking at the wall behind the pet) at a high level in the allotted time. There are ten of them in total, so for a successful passage you will have to sweat.

item.title: Mahjong Connect
item.description: Mahjong 1 is an almost classic version of this Chinese solitaire game. It consists of several levels, the transition to which looks like a journey through the map. Time to complete each stage is limited. There are several auxiliary buttons on the right side of the screen that either remove chips or give a hint.

item.title: Mahjong Gardens
item.description: Dragon Mahjong game is not very similar to the classic version of this puzzle. The only thing they have in common is the need to search for and remove chips with the same pictures from the field. On the right side of the screen is a set of mahjong tiles. On the left, a dragon flies slowly, on which “bones” are also located. You need to quickly find pairings. Any gamer can play the exciting Mahjong Dragon for free.

item.title: Mahjong King
item.description: Quite interesting will be the passage of the game Mahjong paired patterns. Yes, it only remotely resembles the Chinese version of solitaire, but it is not without its charm and even originality. The rules will become more difficult from level to level. The number of hints when moving to the next stage is not restored (if you used them). In a word, vivid impressions are guaranteed.

item.title: Mahjong Titans
item.description: Solitaire is a traditional Chinese board game. It consists of tablets with hieroglyphs, which are laid out on the playing field face down in the form of a pyramid or a simple platform. The goal of the game of mahjong is to disassemble the figure by removing cards with paired images from it, but only those that are on top and have already been opened.

item.title: Mahjong: Age of Alchemy
item.description: Puzzle games Mahjong Shanghai Dynasty take you back to ancient times. It was there that the logical fun was born, which eventually became popular all over the world. According to the rules of the game, you need to find two identical tiles in a pyramid of tiles. Carefully inspect the structure and try to find bones with an identical denomination in it. You can play this old but very exciting Shanghai mahjong both on your own and with your parents, competing with them in observation skills and the ability to think logically.

item.title: Make A Gingerbread House Cake
item.description: The Bread Simulator game invites you to make a variety of sandwiches. Control a funny character who needs to catch products falling from above. Inedible items should be avoided. If you catch some nonsense three times, then the game will end in a loss. So be careful!

item.title: Mandala Coloring Book
item.description: During this wonderful game you will be able to create your own coloring book. On the screen you will see an image of a girl, choose the background on which she will be, as well as clothes, shoes and accessories. Then it remains only to color the resulting picture using a variety of colors. The finished result can be printed.

item.title: Mango Piggy Piggy Hero
item.description: And here is everyone’s favorite game about crazy birds who entered the battle with arrogant pigs. It is built on the principle of “from simple to complex”. At the first level, you need to launch a bird from a slingshot (Greenpeace people hang themselves out of anger), gouging the pig’s shelter along with the pig itself. At the next level, the task becomes more difficult, and so on.

item.title: Masha And The Bear Jigsaw Puzzle
item.description: The heroes of Jigsaw puzzles for girls Masha and the Bear decided to create an album with frames from the animated series with their participation. A huge photo book was bought, and inseparable friends sat down at a large table to examine their photos and organize them in an album. Opening the box, Masha found that all the photos were cut into small pieces. Help the heroes of the puzzle about Masha and the Bear glue together the photos and arrange them in the album.

item.title: Master Checkers
item.description: Checkers is a game loved by many. She has simple rules. Now you can play checkers with a virtual opponent or with a real one. Choose the desired mode of passage, and also indicate the level of difficulty. Next, a board divided into cells will be displayed on the screen. Move checkers and win!

item.title: Master Checkers Multiplayer
item.description: Play good old checkers according to simple, “home” rules. The blue ones go first, a simple checker moves only forward one cell. You can hit an opponent both forward and backward. If it is possible to remove more than one enemy piece, they beat the entire chain. The winner is the one who removed from the field or blocked all the opponent’s chips.

item.title: Master Chess Multiplayer
item.description: The Chess for Two game was created specifically for beginners who are not yet very good at thinking through a game strategy. A friend or even a computer will help you learn. Start the game, study the possible moves and act. Perform each of them, find out what it can lead to and, perhaps, find a path that will lead to the defeat of your opponent.

item.title: Math Education For Kids
item.description: The mindfulness game is dedicated to the adventures of Santa Claus. Your task is to help the New Year’s wizard deliver all the presents. Navigate through the labyrinth, collecting boxes of presents, then to get to the exit. You need to find absolutely all the gifts, otherwise you will not be able to get out of the trap!

item.title: Math Matador
item.description: The game allows you to solve 26 tasks on 6 different maps. But to do this will not be easy at all, you will need knowledge of the basics of mathematics and the ability to think logically. The sum of the numbers appears on the screen, for example, 3+9. From the numbers scattered around the playing field, you must choose the one that corresponds to the final amount by clicking on the squares with the desired values ââone by one.

item.title: Math Parking Multiplication
item.description: Even if you are a driver of a powerful heavy truck, this does not mean that you are allowed to park any way and anywhere. You, too, can have your tires slashed and water tanked for bad parking. So you will train to drive through the whole city, hitch a trailer, carry loads, and then properly park your car neatly and like a normal person.

item.title: Math Test Challenge
item.description: A fun educational game for kids who have just started learning arithmetic. Remember everything that you were taught at school, pick up the mouse and solve the proposed examples by clicking on the number that is the correct answer. Take your time and think carefully, many of the puzzles in this game are tricky and not as easy as they seem at first glance.

item.title: Math Test Challenge 1
item.description: Educational math games for grade 1 offer you to practice your counting skills. The screen displays two rows of cards. At the top of the screen are images of objects, and at the bottom - numbers. You need to count the items and match each card with the correct number. Correct pairs will immediately disappear from the screen. An educational game for the first grade takes place in several stages, and the task gradually becomes more difficult.

item.title: Medieval Defense Z
item.description: Everything is simple here: there are two locks. One belongs to the enemy, and the other belongs to you. The task is to protect your castle from destruction and wipe out the enemy. Before the start of the battles, you can choose the level of difficulty, the option of passing the game, as well as see the instructions (which will help you quickly understand the controls). The graphics do not shine, but they tried to compensate for this shortcoming with dynamism.

item.title: Memory Mach Jungle Animals
item.description: During the Forest Animals game, the inhabitants of the forest decided to play hide and seek and invite you to take part in this exciting game. In a limited time, try to find all the animals hiding on the playing field. Hover over the found animal with the mouse, and it will look out of its hiding place. You can play this game on your own or with your friends.

item.title: Merge Jewels
item.description: The next version of Minecraft awaits gamers after downloading. View, as always, from the first person. The character appears in the world already with a certain set of items. Management is standard. It is better to immediately switch to full screen mode (right mouse button and click on full screen). You can’t get killed here. You need to complete the tasks that the game itself throws up.

item.title: Mickey & Minnie - Parisian Park Puzzler
item.description: Mickey Mouse and his girlfriend Mini went for a walk in the woods. It is their portrait on a walk that you need to collect from separate fragments. At the bottom of the screen you can see a red button. Click on it to show one of the parts of the image. Use your mouse to place it where you want it. It will not be difficult to do this, since you will always have a translucent original image in front of you.

item.title: Mickeys Spin and Stack
item.description: The famous Mickey Mouse and his girlfriend Minnie went on a trip on a small plane. Help the brave pilot avoid obstacles and get to the end point of the journey without crashing the plane and collecting the maximum number of reward points. You can destroy some obstacles with the help of a special pie thrower.

item.title: Mineblock Adventure
item.description: After launching the Minecraft 4 game, you will find yourself in a world made entirely of blocks. You will need to play as a character who will have to explore the virtual space and extract important resources. You can find here wood, stones and other useful items needed to create new objects. Work on them is carried out on a workbench, where you need to place a certain amount of resources.

item.title: Minecaves 2
item.description: Do you love Minecraft, but the computer can’t handle 3D graphics? No problem! You can do what you love while playing Mine Blocks 2d. Except for the fact that the action takes place in two-dimensional space, there are few differences. The bottom line is the same extraction of materials, the manufacture of tools, and so on. You can now see mineral deposits immediately, as well as your character, by the way.

item.title: Minecraft Jigsaw
item.description: A real find for all adventure lovers. Help the boy who, according to the terms of the Minecraft 2D game, fell asleep at the lesson and ended up in an unknown world. He will have to fight with strange cubic creatures of pink color with heads that look like hammers. And even if this 2d-world is only a dream, it is undesirable to expose yourself to the blows of monsters.

item.title: Mixed World
item.description: Assemble the pyramid in the correct order! Just put multi-colored rings on the column in such a way that they are arranged in order of decreasing size. The largest ring should be at the bottom. If you suddenly take an inappropriate element, then it simply will not be put on the column.

item.title: Moana Cute Zoo
item.description: The first thing that pleases, even when loading, is the game interface in Russian. And this means that there will be no problems with understanding the instructions. So, a toy is a kind of training for those who decide to get a pet. So that users are imbued with how many problems await them. And the execution is quite serious.

item.title: Money Movers
item.description: Larry and Barry’s buddies are thieves, and they do their illegal deeds under the cover of night. Fat Barry can carry a lot in his bag, but only Larry can handle the obstacles in his path. Help them get past the guards, all kinds of barriers, other traps and return to their lair.

item.title: Money Movers 2
item.description: During the game Thieves 2 you have to manage a team of robbers, consisting of four people. Each of them has unique abilities, and your task is to use the skills of robbers in time, depending on the situation. Try to empty all the game rooms and take out the jewelry within the allotted time.

item.title: Money Movers 3 Guard Duty
item.description: Do you like songs about the Vladimir Central, golden domes and other opuses in the same vein? Oh, then you will get real pleasure from playing Thief in the House. So, as you might have already guessed, your character will be … well, draw your own conclusions. By the way, the view is from the first person, so you will have a complete identification. Your task is to clear the house and the conscience of its owners from the ballast in the form of money and jewelry.

item.title: Monster Cafe
item.description: And again with us the beloved and unique Sponge Bob! Today he works in a bakery and oversees the pizza making process. The process is mechanized, but the machines are old and often turned off. Bob needs to run between them and turn them on in time, and throw the damaged products from the conveyor into the trash. If he can’t do his job, he’ll be fired!

item.title: Monster Heart Surgery
item.description: In this game, you get into the city hospital of a huge metropolis and become a surgeon. Together with the best sister of the hospital - Lara, you have to perform a very difficult heart surgery on one little patient. Follow Lara’s prompts carefully and follow all the necessary procedures. Thanks to your efforts, the operation will be successful, and very soon the baby will recover.

item.title: Monster Tower Defense
item.description: It is necessary to repel the attack of the monsters that attacked your state. For defense, you can use towers that can destroy the enemy moving along the road. By upgrading your defenses, get the opportunity to effectively defend against stronger monsters.

item.title: Monster Truck Coloring
item.description: The animation studio invites you to take part in the creation of an animated film about dinosaur island. You will take the place of one of the animators who color the frames. Use the electronic brush to color in the picture of the tourists meeting the giant monster for the first time.

item.title: Monster Truck Coloring Book
item.description: Another client of your tuning studio asks to turn his BMW 4 into a powerful monster. Create a unique car design, come up with a new original color for it, which will give the sports car the look of a wild predator. Use the virtual brush to paint the car and don’t forget to save your work to your computer’s memory.

item.title: Monster Truck Driving
item.description: An excellent toy with three-dimensional graphics and a wonderful drawing of details. You have been given a hefty car on wheels, like Belaz. And on such a monster you will have to go through a real obstacle course. This would be easy if not for the countdown timer. Each segment has a limited number of minutes.

item.title: Monster Truck Madness
item.description: Kids Games Racing games for girls are very popular. In this one, you will go on a bike ride together with the famous traveler Dasha. Help the baby get to the end point of the journey. Watch the road carefully and warn the girl about steep ascents and descents. Thanks to your help, Dasha will not only enjoy the walk, but will quickly get home.

item.title: Monster Truck Soccer
item.description: monster truck

item.title: Monsters Match-3
item.description: The Match 3 game sends you to the shores of the mysterious Amazon, where you have to unravel the mysteries of an ancient Indian tribe and get to a mysterious artifact. In order to move from stage to stage, you need to destroy all the clay tablets placed on the playing field. To do this, you need to collect three or more gems of the same color in a row.

item.title: Moon Mahjong
item.description: Tired of the usual solitaire card games? Then try this mahjong variant. Here, instead of hieroglyphs, card suits are drawn on the chips. The rules for passing are also somewhat different from the usual Chinese entertainment and are somewhat reminiscent of Solitaire solitaire. To make it easier to understand, you should read the instructions before starting the game.

item.title: Moorhuhn Pirates
item.description: You have never seen such a game as Chicken Hunt! Painted chickens, or rather domestic roosters, fly back and forth across the photographed landscape. And you supposedly hunt them. More precisely, you simply move the cursor and press the mouse button. For reloading - “space”. If you shoot down an airship, points are removed from you - a fine.

item.title: Moto Fury
item.description: During the game Racing on motorcycles and cars, you are invited to ride along a winding track and demonstrate all your driving talents. Here you can choose for yourself one of the vehicles: either a car or a motorcycle. Next, go to the track, where your rivals have already gathered. Gotta get ahead of them all! During the passage, the nitro function will be very useful to you, which will allow you to speed up your car or motorcycle.

item.title: Moto Hill Bike Racing
item.description: Kids Racing for Boys is an entertaining game that will take you on challenging tracks along the coast of the ocean. It’s time for amazing adventures in your life. Under the terms of the race, you have to drive one of the many rare cars. And even if it is an old car, it does not mean at all that it cannot participate in the race. We promise you will be surprised to the core by what speed this old woman can develop.

item.title: Moto Mx
item.description: In Cool Bike Racing you have to go to the near future and ride a powerful bike on the surface of an unknown planet. Carefully inspect the track on which you have to go, and try to avoid falling into failures or other traps that lie in wait for you in these unexplored spaces.

item.title: Moto X3M Pool Party
item.description: According to the plot of the game Racing on bikes, you will become a participant in the world championship in moto trial. Go through all the stages and become the winner of this tournament.

item.title: Moto X3M Winter
item.description: Motorcycle racing games for kids offer you to take part in a fun competition. To win, you need to drive as far as possible. The difficulty lies in the fact that you have to ride on one wheel, and the track on which you are moving is filled with all sorts of obstacles, steep ascents and descents.

item.title: Motocross
item.description: In the bike racing game for girls you are trying on the role of a stunt driver performing stunts on a sports bike. Pass difficult tracks, perform stunts, prove that you are one of the best extreme racers. After each performance, you will receive reward points and cash prizes to be used to learn and improve the motorcycle’s performance.

item.title: Motorbike Puzzle Challenge
item.description: In this game, you have the opportunity to take part in the competitions of the best motorcycle racers on the planet. The goal is to reach the finish line as quickly as possible and move on to the next level. All that is required of you is to correctly use the arrow keys on the keyboard to control the motorcycle. During the race, collect power-ups that increase your speed.

item.title: Mr. Dubstep
item.description: Do you want to go to the virtual world and get a lot of vivid impressions? Then feel free to run this wonderful game. A lot of interesting things await you in it: various levels, unusual characters, dangerous enemies that you need to defeat. It will definitely be unforgettable, and you will not be able to tear yourself away from the gameplay for a long time.

item.title: Music Board
item.description: When you play Make Music, you will turn into a DJ. Before you will be a special installation, and you can use all its features. Click on the available buttons and watch the result. The process is not limited to anyone and nothing, just experiment and enjoy a variety of compositions.

item.title: Music Line Christmas
item.description: The Music game will introduce you to Santa Claus, who loves rock. Play one of the songs with the brutal grandfather! To do this, you have a powerful guitar at your disposal. Colored elements move across the screen, and you just have to press the corresponding buttons. Note that sometimes you need to hold down a key to get the desired effect. The difficulty level is selected before the process starts, and you can also specify the melody you are going to play.

item.title: Music Memory Challenge
item.description: Rock music will one day save the world from aliens. Do you want to make sure of this? Start the game. Children will not have to play melodies in it. You need to control a rocker who, with his guitar, is at war with aliens that look like clots of green slime. At each stage, you need to get to the exit in one minute. Shoot enemies with music.

item.title: My Burger Biz
item.description: In this game, you have to figure out the technological process of making hamburgers and serve visitors to an ordinary small cafe. The client will be satisfied when he receives his order on time. To do this, you need to quickly prepare the dish and hand it to the buyer. Manage all processes with the mouse.

item.title: My Dream Hospital
item.description: The game Hospital will turn you into a real doctor who knows a lot about complex operations. And the patient will be the boy Egor, who was born with a weak heart. Because of this, he cannot live a full life and often gets tired. Therefore, it is necessary to carry out an operation that will help the little boy cope with the problem. The hospital will provide you with all the necessary tools to use during the treatment process.

item.title: My Little Pony Pop
item.description: Everyone loves the holidays, and magical ponies in particular. In this game, you have a chance to throw a party for them. Approach the task seriously and then everything will work out. You choose the music (images of records at the bottom of the screen), the venue for the celebration (drag and drop the desired pictures from above into the cells) and special effects: balloons, confetti, fireworks, and more. When you’re done, you can admire the finished result.

item.title: My Little Pony Winter Fashion 2
item.description: Twilight Sparkle was instructed to complete an important mission and you need to help the horse cope with the task. She is attacked by winged enemies that need to be shot at. Your task is to get rid of all enemies on the level. Try not to let enemies close to you, otherwise they can take away health points.

item.title: My Pony My Little Race
item.description: Funny dinosaur Gizmo decided to do a bike trial. What came out of it, the Race for Kids game will show you. It is necessary to help this cheerful character to pass a difficult track on his bike. Along the way, you need to overcome all sorts of obstacles and try to collect all the stars and various bonuses. The game is against the clock, so don’t relax.

item.title: Neon Battle Tank
item.description: Games Tanks 6 will show you one of the rules of warfare. Never stand still when the battle is on. Stopped - consider hit. And in this game you should stick to just such a manner of conducting a shootout. There are many enemies, they have fast cars and they constantly attack. Control the tank with the arrow keys and constantly shoot at the enemy.

item.title: New Platform
item.description: The main feature of the game can be considered, perhaps, the mode for two players at the same time. In this case, someone will control Mario himself, and someone - his girlfriend. The task is simple, as in all Mario games - you need to reach the end of the level, collecting as many bonuses as possible and not sticking flippers together.

item.title: Nick Kingdoms
item.description: In this game you are invited to protect your possessions. Choose one of the four kingdoms and start defending it. Your task is to set up defensive towers so that they turn into an effective barrier to advancing enemies. But this requires money. At the beginning of the game you will already have a small amount, and then you can replenish it with a reward for the destroyed enemies.

item.title: Nick Surfs Up
item.description: SpongeBob decided to learn how to surf and turned to the great surfer Jack Kahuna for help. But first, the yellow baby needs to harmonize his mind and the spirit of the sea. Help Bob learn the intricacies of the science of surfing and then demonstrate his skills in conquering the waves.

item.title: Nickelodeon Cooking Contest
item.description: Imagine that SpongeBob got a job at a pizzeria. He is there all alone, and the clients are just like that. You need to help him serve everyone efficiently and on time. Carefully look at the order that the client makes. Then, very quickly, collect the necessary ingredients and click on the spatula - the pizza will go into the oven. If you make a mistake, throw the pizza in the trash.

item.title: Ninja Hero Runner
item.description: Very dynamic and well drawn game. You can’t skip the intro video, but it’s short. Side view. The main character runs away from the pursuit of enemies. It is necessary to press a certain button in time (at the very beginning, the game itself will suggest which one) so that it jumps or slides. You need to reach the end of the level.

item.title: One Hand Cowboy
item.description: Your character is an alien sheriff, very similar to Western characters. The action takes place on his home planet. You need to kill monsters, and at the same time stay alive. With the collected money, you will be able to purchase more powerful weapons over time. If you are wondering why all the cheese is boron, see the introduction and read the text under the pictures.

item.title: One Man Invasion
item.description: You have to, driving a small plane, break through to your base, which will not be so easy, because hundreds of enemy planes are moving towards you. Destroy the enemy and collect the coins that have fallen out of him. With this money you can buy extra lives, new weapons and equipment for the aircraft. During the battle, make sure that the gun does not overheat, otherwise problems cannot be avoided.

item.title: Ordinary Girls Cosmetic Surgery
item.description: In this game, you become a famous plastic surgeon who is going to have a very difficult operation. An overweight girl came to your clinic, dreaming of correcting her figure with the help of surgery. Carefully examine the patient, conduct all the necessary tests, and then proceed to the operation.

item.title: Panda Commander
item.description: In the course of the game for boys Airplanes you have to become a pilot of an ultra-modern fighter. These machines are the first to defend the air spaces at the slightest danger to the state. In modern warfare, a high-speed and well-armed aircraft plays a big role. Pilots are the first to take on enemy attacks and become a shield for the enemy army. In this game for kids, your task is not to let the invader into your territory.

item.title: Parking Fury
item.description: It is unlikely that the game Car Parking will teach you how to properly park your car in the parking lot. You can learn this only in a driving school, or on your own, but in any case through a long and hard training. And in this case, parking cars is just fun. So, you need to put the car in the specified place. In this case, you need to park correctly, that is, according to the inscriptions “back” and “front”.

item.title: Parking Fury 3
item.description: So, in this game you will learn how to work as a parking attendant again (and what if you don’t want to learn anything else?). The task is as follows: in the allotted time, it is necessary to overtake the cars parked at the curb to the parking lot. First you have to get into one of the cars, and then start driving it. Do it carefully, because after three collisions comes a game over.

item.title: Parking Panic
item.description: The process of the game for girls Car Parking, if it differs from the boyish options, is only cartoonish. The game can’t be called easy. In addition to the difficult driving, there is also a timer. That is, the task must be completed within the allotted time. The task itself is to overtake the Scooby Doo minibus from point A to point B and park. At the same time, even a slight collision with the curb leads to damage to the machine.

item.title: Party Time Ocean Princesses
item.description: Any representative of the fair sex always wants to look attractive and fashionable. Game for girls Dress Up invites you to work a little as a stylist and create new spectacular images for the heroine. You have a huge variety of clothes at your disposal, and you can combine any elements of the wardrobe as you wish. The result will be incredibly spectacular! And do not forget to pay attention to the compatibility of the selected parts of the image.

item.title: Paw Patrol Coloring Book
item.description: All drawing lovers will enjoy the process of the game for children Coloring for 6 years. In it, you need to work on the image of a strongman lifting a barbell. All available colors are displayed at the bottom of the screen, and you can select any of them, and then click on the piece of the picture you want to color.

item.title: Penalty Shoot-Out
item.description: Game Football 2015 will give you the opportunity to become the central figure of the world championship. True, you wonât have to participate in all the matches of the championship, itâs enough just to spend a number of dangerous moments. You have to catch the pass, handle the ball and try to finish the combination successfully by scoring a goal. Be careful and attentive, your football rivals 2015 have a very professional goalkeeper and sometimes even a defender manages to get to the goal, who, of course, will try to stop you.

item.title: Penguins Jigsaw
item.description: The game Penguins will tell you about birds that cannot fly, but feel like fish underwater. This innate ability helps penguins get their own food. After all, they feed mainly on small fish. Our penguin game has one interesting feature. This is an inversion. To turn left, you must press the right arrow key, and vice versa. Acting in this way, you have to help the little penguin catch as many fish as possible.

item.title: Pet Run
item.description: Favorite reindeer of Princess Elsa - the famous heroine of the cartoon “Frozen”, fell through the ice. The brave girl managed to pull it out, but the unfortunate animal is in a terrible state. Carefully inspect the deer, determine what medical procedures he needs to do and start treatment as soon as possible.

item.title: Pet Salon Kitty Care
item.description: Like all other Tamagotchi games, this one involves taking care of pets. First, the user needs to choose a cat.
