The whole process of passing comes down to meeting the needs of the fluffy. Pay attention to the top of the screen: three sets of symbols with stripes. Try to make sure that the stripes do not decrease to zero.

item.title: Piano Online
item.description: After starting the game Music on the piano, you will see Disney princesses. They invite you to come up with your own melodies. Click on the microphone button and start recording. Just play the already familiar compositions on the virtual piano or try to compose your own. When you finish this process, the finished music can be listened to. A total of three slots are available for recording melodies. Of course, if you suddenly don’t like an option, you can always delete it.

item.title: Pirates vs Zombies
item.description: While playing Horror 2, you have to fight with square-headed zombies that have filled all the surroundings. They attack in crowds, so do not stand still, but constantly move, choosing a convenient position for shooting. Try to hit the red barrels - they explode and destroy all the dead that are nearby.

item.title: Pixel Soldiers Jigsaw
item.description: In this exciting game, you will find puzzles on the theme of the Lego constructor so beloved by many. Choose any of the proposed pictures and start the puzzle. Arrange the pieces in the correct order to get the selected image. Parts can be turned over if necessary, if it is not possible to install them in the picture in their original position.

item.title: Pizza Cafe
item.description: Today you will have to work in the hottest spot in the city - a popular pizzeria. A lot of people dream of enjoying delicious local pizza. And behind the counter today you work alone. Carefully monitor what order the buyer makes, quickly prepare pizza, pack it and give it to the client.

item.title: Pizza Mania
item.description: Papas Pizzeria is a great simulation game that will teach you how to cook delicious pizza. There are many recipes for preparing this dish, all of which have been changed more than once and supplemented with new ingredients, but the base has always remained the same - dough, ketchup and grated cheese.

item.title: Pizza Ninja
item.description: During the game Dad’s Pizza Restaurant you have to visit a small establishment where they cook an amazing Italian dish. That is why there is simply no end to customers here. You can even try making pizza yourself. On the right is a sample. Try to repeat it exactly using the dough and products on the left.

item.title: Pizza Party
item.description: After starting the game, you will transform into a real chef who knows a lot about Italian delicacies. Now you will be asked to cook a delicious 4 cheese pizza. For this, the kitchen already has everything you need. You just have to follow the steps in the recipe. Hints will help!

item.title: Pizza Realife Cooking
item.description: You have to help the chef by preparing super delicious pizza and delighting customers. You need to act quickly before the buyer’s patience runs out and he leaves without lunch. At your disposal there is a detailed book of recipes and a complete set of necessary products and spices. If anything from the list runs out, you can immediately order and buy it.

item.title: Plane Go
item.description: You have to become a pilot of a small sports plane and demonstrate various tricks in the air. When performing aerobatics, the pilot experiences huge overloads. Therefore, it is very important not to lose control of the aircraft. Otherwise something bad will happen. Follow the arrows, they will indicate the route of movement.

item.title: Planes Coloring Book
item.description: While playing Airplanes for Kids you will have to take a keyboard training course. You become the pilot of a small plane that goes on an air journey. Your flight is divided into many separate stages, each of which will have to make your way through armies of enemy airships and balloons. In order to destroy the enemy, you need to type on the keyboard the letters indicated on the balloon.

item.title: Pony Rarity Baby Birth
item.description: Pregnant women need special attention, and this time you will have to work with the future mom. The task is to examine the patient, carry out all the necessary procedures for diagnosis and prescribe the correct treatment. For this, the necessary items are already prepared on the screen.

item.title: Pop Stone 2
item.description: In this game you find yourself in ancient dungeons created by the Mayan people. In order to get out of here, you need to solve a logical puzzle. Try to destroy the colored balls blocking the entrance to the next levels of this exciting toy. To do this, you need to collect chains of the same color balls.

item.title: Portal Chase
item.description: Enemies are chasing SpongeBob and you need to help him get away from them. Drive a funny hamburger car and try not to let the enemy agents grab Bob. Your main task is to drive as far as possible. The distance traveled is displayed at the top of the screen.

item.title: Power Mahjong The Tower
item.description: Regular Chinese mahjong often causes difficulties for beginners, and especially for the youngest users. The reason is simple: small drawings and hieroglyphs similar to each other. It also offers a somewhat simplified puzzle with clear for everyone, large pictures. By the way, it was also developed by the Chinese.

item.title: Princess Dress In Incredible 2 Style
item.description: In this game you have to become a stylist for a cute girl. Your task is to make her makeup and choose the perfect outfit for the festive event. For make-up, the game features a large number of decorative cosmetics: blush, mascara, lipstick. And in addition to chic dresses, there are tiaras, gloves and other accessories.

item.title: Princess Fairytale Pony Grooming
item.description: Do you love dressing up? Then boldly launch this most interesting game! Here you have to come up with a new image for the cutie pony. The virtual wardrobe includes three categories of things: hats, suits and shoes. You need to combine the selected little things with each other, trying to get the most attractive result.

item.title: Princess New Years Party
item.description: A well-known fashion house invites you to take part in the competition for the position of fashion designer. Under the terms of the competition, you must create an original image using items from the provided wardrobe. First, think up an original hairstyle and make-up for the model, and then dress it up in the set you invented.

item.title: Princess Perfect Wedding
item.description: In this game you will find puzzles on the Winx theme in the style of Valentine’s Day. On the screen you will see several pieces that need to be correctly connected to each other. The game consists of several levels, and at each stage the number of elements will increase. The time for passing is limited and is only 30 seconds!

item.title: Princess Vs Villains Selfie Contest
item.description: The girl does not look the best, but she really wants to be photographed. Your task is to create an attractive image for the heroine of the game. First, try on the role of a beautician and carry out various useful procedures that will help the heroine’s face to shine. And then choose a cute outfit.

item.title: Princess Winter Shopping Online
item.description: During this game you have to create a cute new look for the girl. To begin with, it is proposed to make the heroine make-up, using a variety of decorative cosmetics for this. Then you can start choosing clothes, shoes and stylish accessories. The finished image will receive an assessment, which will immediately appear on the screen.

item.title: Princesses Summer Swimming Competition
item.description: In this game you have to make a beautiful fashion model simply irresistible by turning her into a catwalk star. Start with makeup and hair. After you finish this section, move on to the wardrobe. The choice of clothes here is more than chic. It’s time to get confused and hang at the screen for a couple of hours. Pay attention to the small buttons at the bottom right near the model.

item.title: Protect The Kingdom
item.description: The developer company “Armor Games” again pleases us with its creation. The gameplay is preceded by a story. It can be skipped. However, a quick immersion in the fever of battles still does not work. After all, you are dealing with a turn-based strategy. It is recommended to look closely at the tips and think through your moves well.

item.title: Public Service Puzzle
item.description: Do you want to pass the time near the computer together with a friend? Then, perhaps, the variant of the game For two cars will suit you. Football is to be played. Two cars, two goals and one ball. Everything is extremely simple. The screen is divided into two halves horizontally. Control is possible both from the keyboard and from joysticks, which is not often found in such entertainment. In the case of a game with a keyboard for two, the cars will be controlled by different keys.

item.title: Pudding Monsters
item.description: Help the funny mouse complete all the levels of this exciting game! At any location you will find a room with obstacles and mice enclosed in mousetraps. You need to move the main character in such a way as to eventually help get to a special device that will take him to the next stage. Try to free all the hero’s friends!

item.title: Puppy Cupcake
item.description: For girls 5 6 years

item.title: Puzzles So Different Princess
item.description: Evil and insidious witches managed to sneak into the school of magic and turn all the students and teachers into photographs, and then break them into tiny pieces. Help the fairies from the Winx team free their friends from a nightmarish spell by connecting all the scattered puzzle pieces and restoring the photo.

item.title: Queen Of Glitter Prom Ball
item.description: This game will surely appeal to most girls. But boys can also like it, because the princess who needs to be dressed up is quite capable of taking a prize at a world beauty contest. It is possible that the ball is arranged on this occasion. For such an event, the heroine of the game must be dressed appropriately. Gamers have an impressive wardrobe at their disposal, as well as a good selection of hairstyles and accessories.

item.title: Race Down
item.description: The most incredible adventure begins! You find yourself in a city, on the streets of which you can do a lot. The Survival Race game provides you with a powerful car equipped with a couple of âtrunksâ. With their help, you can destroy other cars and other objects. You will be given missions to complete while moving through the city streets. For example, the first task will be related to the destruction of taxi cars.

item.title: Racing Cars Coloring Book
item.description: In this game, you have to become the leading designer of a car tuning studio. This time you need to repaint the huge SUV of the German company Audi. Using a virtual brush, apply original paints to the car that can turn it into a real work of art.

item.title: Rainbow Pony Caring
item.description: Rainbow Dash came to your hair salon to get a new haircut. You need to show all your skills to style her mane and achieve a cool result. You can use any tools: scissors, comb, hair dryer, curling iron. A huge number of hair dyes are also available.

item.title: Rapunzel Wedding Dress Designer 2
item.description: From the name it is clear that young gamers will have to work on the appearance of the princess, but not the usual one, but the oriental one. Therefore, her outfit will be appropriate. First you need to try on the individual parts of the costume on a mannequin. The next step is fabric selection, cutting and sewing. At the end of the game, do not forget about the hairstyle, and then print the finished picture or save it in the computer’s memory.

item.title: Rapunzel Wedding Party Dress
item.description: After launching the game for girls My Dream Wedding, you will turn into a real wedding ceremonies expert. You need to decorate the venue for the next holiday. To do this, you have at your disposal a huge number of decorative elements that can be installed anywhere. The size of objects can be easily changed, and it is also possible to repaint them in any color you like. Don’t forget to add the bride and groom!

item.title: Red Ball VS Green King
item.description: The nightmarish black square decided to turn all the inhabitants of the kingdom of balls into terrible square monsters. Only you and your brave partner, the Red Ball, can stop the villain. By controlling the movements of the round hero, get to the factory of the insidious square and free the unfortunate inhabitants of the round planet.

item.title: Road Fury
item.description: Angry Berds decided to organize a wild race - a tournament that will reveal the fastest bird. Decide on behalf of whom you will play, and join the fight for the honorary title. The competition is divided into a huge number of stages, each of which you need to win. Thanks to your efforts, the selected bird will definitely become a champion.

item.title: Robbie
item.description: In the future, when the usual fights in the ring will be boring for everyone, and technological progress will make almost any dream come true, people will create a new kind of entertainment for themselves. These are robot battles where you can put your bot in the arena and he will have to fight with many other enemies to win the tournament.

item.title: Robo Twins
item.description: No, the Autobots were not captured or arrested on charges of stealing engine oil. It’s just that two robot friends were alone on a planet destroyed by a nuclear war and are trying to get out of there. You can help them. But the game will require you to be smart, as well as the ability to work in a team, because robots can overcome most of the obstacles only by merging into a single whole.

item.title: Robocar Coloring Book
item.description: The famous supercar racing world champion asks you to prepare his new car for the next Grand Prix. Use the electronic brush to apply war paint to the sports car, which will bring good luck to the driver and allow him to become the most recognizable participant in the competition.

item.title: Robocar Jigsaw
item.description: Hey, enough to destroy and shoot everything around. Time to spread your brains and train your attention. In this game, you need to turn the fragments of the picture so that they take the correct position relative to each other. At the same time, you need to comply with the standard. When you collect one picture, you get another. Pump your brain!

item.title: Robot Maker
item.description: A galactic army of robotic invaders from a distant Iron Planet has attacked Earth’s cities. As one of the elite pilots-transformers you go to protect your home planet. Try to break through the ranks of the infantry of alien warriors, destroy the enemy’s main base and destroy the commander of the iron aliens.

item.title: Rock Hero
item.description: It is useless to read the “How to play” section in the menu if you do not know English. Unless you get to know the control buttons a little. In a nutshell, the gameplay simulates playing an electric guitar with three strings. Everything looks like this: colored balls run along the strings. They correspond to the buttons on the keyboard. You have to press to get the melody.

item.title: Rock Man Jumper
item.description: Many people know the merry fellow Bart Simpson, who cannot imagine life without getting into another adventure. An interesting game for children shows that Bart has found a motorcycle somewhere and now wants to ride it. Will you ride with him? Help Bart complete the given distance and collect emoticons to get reward points. For each smiley, 100 points will be credited to the game account. Such interesting entertainment for children in the company of your favorite character will allow you to have a great time and cheer you up.

item.title: Rocket Rodent Nightmare
item.description: The backstory of the game Rocket to the Moon is very funny. Worth a look. By the way, the drawing is also top notch! And the process itself is amusing. The bottom line is that you have to pilot a spacecraft launched to the satellite of our planet. Use the keys and follow the instructions. Don’t forget to upgrade before each new attempt.

item.title: Roller Splat
item.description: Puzzles train the brain in an easy, fun and relaxed way, which is extremely important. Your goal in this game is to complete as many different tasks as possible. For example: put the correct time on the clock, write down a combination of numbers from memory, win the game “Rock, paper, scissors”, etc. And all this in only two minutes.

item.title: Ruin
item.description: An excellent smart game for children aged 5-6 will capture your attention for a long time. The screen displays a playing field on which 16 chips are placed. You need to move them in such a way that each of the four corners ends up with chips of the same color. You can only move them to an adjacent empty cell. The point of the game is to complete the task as quickly as possible, while making the minimum number of moves.

item.title: Run Astro Run
item.description: Before you is a unique puzzle game in which you have to find the path by which the rocket can get to the space station. You will have to overcome many obstacles and avoid traps. Navigate the ship through the universe, making turns at small intermediate stops. In case of an error, you will fly off the screen.

item.title: Running Ninja
item.description: Before you is an excellent toy in all respects (graphics, animation, plot, and so on). The young ninja had to embark on a dangerous journey on his own two (see introduction). Along the way, you will have to traditionally jump and slide. But besides this, it will be necessary to fight enemies who, by the way, are armed, unlike your character.

item.title: Russian Cars Coloring Book
item.description: The famous German automotive concern is preparing to present its new supercar. The management of the company offered you, as one of the best designers in the world, to color the presentation copy. Show maximum imagination and apply a unique color to the car that will delight all automotive industry specialists.

item.title: Russian Cars Jigsaw
item.description: In this game, you are invited to dream up a little and practice car design. You can change windows, headlights, wheels, brakes and more. Many auto repair shops nowadays have enough resources to make a cool car out of an ordinary car. Today you will also have the opportunity to turn an ordinary Lada into a supercar.

item.title: Sailor Scouts Summer Style
item.description: Start the process of playing Sailor Moon dress up for girls and meet the heroine of the famous animated series. Your task is simple: you need to create a new image for her, using any of the proposed elements. Here you are provided with all kinds of blouses, skirts and cute dresses. The chosen outfit should be supplemented with gloves, earrings and other accessories. And Sailor Moon can’t do without a magic wand!

item.title: Santa City Run
item.description: Christmas is the best time of the year, because Santa comes to everyone with long-awaited gifts. And if you want to surprise the main wizard of the planet, prepare delicious cookies. But be very careful and attentive when choosing ingredients. Prepare a dessert and if Santa likes it, you will get the best present.

item.title: Sheep Hunter
item.description: Sean, Shirley and Timmy - lambs from the animated series, were abducted by aliens. Now they need to get out of the spaceship and escape from the enemies. You need to help the sheep cope with the task. Move them around locations, overcome various obstacles and don’t forget to collect socks for extra points.

item.title: Shopping Cart Hero HD
item.description: The young emperor Kuzco received a letter from his beloved Malina. He went to the laboratory of the insidious Izma to meet the girl there. Unfortunately, the naive romantic fell into a trap and you must help him get out of the trap. Control the movements of the emperor’s cart and try to get away from the chase.

item.title: Sisters Rock Punk Style Contest
item.description: Best friend test for girls offers very simple questions, but thanks to them you can find out how good you are as a friend. All questions relate to your relationship with your girlfriend. Just choose from the three answer options the one that best suits your behavior. After you answer all the questions of the friendship test, the result will be displayed on the screen. You will see detailed information about how you behave in friendships.

item.title: Smart Soccer
item.description: You have to play real 3D football in the stadiums of many countries. Choose your favorite team and compete against other players in the world tournament. Play a full game in two half-times, ending with a control of the players’ statistics. When you Crazy Games a goal, you can even review your actions in slow motion replay.

item.title: Smurfberries Drop
item.description: It’s time to start harvesting! Five baskets of different colors will appear on the screen, and you need to place the corresponding vegetables and fruits in them. Grab the fruit with the mouse, and then transfer it to a basket of the same shade. If you make a mistake, the element will return to its place. Act carefully to make mistakes as little as possible.

item.title: Smurfys Coloring
item.description: The task in this game is simple - you need to color a picture of the Smurfs using a palette of colors. The variety of shades will greatly facilitate the process of completing the task. To control, use the mouse - click on the left button to select a color, and then on the area that you want to paint with it.

item.title: Snail Bob 6 Winter Story
item.description: A famous adventurer accidentally found an ancient map and is going in search of the treasure chest indicated on it. The kid invites you to go on a journey with him. Help the snail overcome all the obstacles on the way and get to the ancient temple, which houses the relics of the lost snail civilization.

item.title: Snail Bob 7 Fantasy Story
item.description: In this game you will meet a snail named Bob. It is necessary to help him deal with the obstacles that interfere with the path. This will help all sorts of mechanisms that are activated when using levers and buttons. The game consists of a huge number of different levels, where you can not do without ingenuity and attentiveness.

item.title: Snail Park
item.description: Spongebob was once a child! And it is for such a baby that you are invited to take care of during the game SpongeBob 2 for girls. After loading, a cute baby will appear on the screen, which needs to be washed, fed and cheered. In addition, hints will constantly appear here about which item should be used now, and you just have to take it and use it for its intended purpose.

item.title: Snake
item.description: This toy is another variation of the world famous Zuma. Try to stop the chains of colored balls with the help of a cannon that tend to fall into the hole. Fire projectiles of different colors from a magic weapon and form lines of 3 or more identical pieces from them, which will instantly disappear.

item.title: Sniper Ultimate Assasin
item.description: No one but you can help a man taken prisoner by terrorists. You are a retired sniper, but your knowledge and experience in this situation are simply irreplaceable. The goal is clear - the bandits must be destroyed, and the prisoner freed. But be careful, among the criminals there are also well-aimed shooters.

item.title: Snowy Kitty Adventure
item.description: The essence of the Adventure Adventure game for boys is to destroy all the enemy soldiers on the level. Controlling a brave commando, run, jump, collect ammunition and ruthlessly kill enemies. But the enemy is also firing, so during the passage of missions, do not be lazy to collect first-aid kits that restore health. You have to go through 6 challenging levels.

item.title: Soccer Master
item.description: According to the rules of the Football 2013 game for two, you will have to fight with an opponent, hitting the ball only with your head. For each win or draw, money is awarded for which you can upgrade your player. For example, it is possible to increase the height of the jump, make a stronger blow or speed up the player.

item.title: Soccer Mob
item.description: Football euphoria swept the whole world. Millions of fans clung to the TV screens. At the stadium, the crowd of thousands bursts into applause. The match of the century begins. And you have the opportunity to participate in this football celebration. Choose your team and go to win victories, prizes and recognition from the audience.

item.title: Soccer Mover
item.description: In this game, you will have the opportunity to touch history and repeat the most unforgettable moments in the life of a famous football player! Third person view. The camera is located slightly above and to the side. You see the penalty area, the goal and the players. Throw free kicks to Crazy Games another historic goal. By the way, easier said than done.

item.title: Soccer Stars Jigsaw
item.description: In this game, everything is like in real football. There are subtle passes, powerful shots, unique combinations and the highest class - when the goalkeeper Crazy Gamess a goal from his own penalty area to the opponent. To win, you need endurance, an accurate eye and a steady hand. And it does not matter that the players all the time stand still and cannot move - this does not make the game less interesting.

item.title: Sochi Toilets Backstage
item.description: Do you want some fun? Then start playing Poop Simulator. Here you will meet a funny character in a red suit. He is ready to demonstrate his outstanding abilities. The fact is that the hero knows how to empty the intestines in ten different ways! In order to see how it might look, you need to click on the buttons located in the side areas of the screen. After that, a cheerful guy will show you a performance that does not look too aesthetically pleasing, but at the same time is able to cheer you up.

item.title: Space Blaze
item.description: The goal of this game, as well as any other, is to go through all the stages. And during the passage you will be in the role of … an alien minibus. Yes, you will have to deal with transporting green men from one point to another. Management of your “car” is quite complicated. Complete the task with minimal fuel and time costs.

item.title: Speed Pool King
item.description: Thanks to this wonderful simulator you will be able to learn the basic rules of playing billiards. Carefully inspect the location of the red balls on the table. Find the right place to place the striker and try to drive them into the pockets. Strive to correctly calculate the trajectory of impact and the force that needs to be applied.

item.title: Speed Racing
item.description: In the exciting game Racing under 3 you will be met by the well-known Angry Birds. Here they ride on aircraft. And you, too, have to take part in this unusual competition. Control one of 3 planes and try to overtake all opponents. Along the way, you will come across coins that you need to collect in order to later purchase upgrades for your aircraft. Their purchase is available to players after each successfully completed level, so you should try not to crash out of the game and save up more money.

item.title: Spider Fly
item.description: The beautiful Mary Jane has been kidnapped by a villain and Peter needs to rescue her urgently! Control Spider-Man who moves on the rooftops and help him cope with all the obstacles. On the way there will be opponents that must be avoided, otherwise they will attack the superhero and prevent him from going further.

item.title: SpongeBob SquarePants And The Saviours Of Slime
item.description: It’s time to go in search of SpongeBob’s pet, Gary the snail. Complete all game tasks in order to eventually reach the goal. You will definitely enjoy traveling through the underwater world of Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob will be very grateful for help in such a difficult task as finding a pet.

item.title: Spongebob Squarepants Lights Out Patrick
item.description: In this game, SpongeBob participates in an underwater race on a slippery surface. Developing almost space speed, the character runs forward, jumps over chasms and collects hamburgers along the way. But besides that, you still need to overtake the snail (it is shown at the top of the screen on the strip). If the snail reaches the finish line first, the hamburgers won’t come in handy.

item.title: SpongeBob SquarePants Tracks Of Terror
item.description: SpongeBob and Patrick boarded a ghost ship in search of treasure. But something unexpected happened and Bob got lost. Patrick is looking for him and asks for your help. Roam the ship, collect coins and look for Bob. For protection from ghosts there is a flashlight. But use it carefully - there are not many batteries. To go to the next level, you need to collect all the coins.

item.title: Square Jump
item.description: Here is a new arcade survival platformer from the Geometry Dash series. It is so captivating and passionate that it is impossible to tear yourself away. But get ready for the fact that the game will be difficult. Especially if you don’t have much of a reaction. The protagonist is a big-eyed cube, moving along a picturesque rocky location dotted with abysses, steep ascents and descents. It is worth even once to stumble, as the character will fall down and break into a cake.

item.title: Square Run
item.description: About the online project “Geometry dash 2 2” it’s hard to say that this is a simulator of something. Before you is a typical platformer with a very simple goal, but not an easy passage. To play, the user will need a lot of patience and strong nerves. And also the Internet. The character is a cube with a cheerful face, sliding from left to right. The gamer’s task is to help him perform the jump in time, avoiding collisions with obstacles and traps.

item.title: Stick Tank Wars
item.description: With the help of the Steam Tanks game you will have to take part in races on modern tanks. In life, of course, a combat vehicle does not drive like that. But this is a computer game in which everything is possible. In general, his speed is decent, and unlike a car, he is not afraid of roadsides or trees. But be careful when overcoming obstacles.

item.title: Stickjet Challenge
item.description: Right now you can take part in a tournament where any fighting techniques are allowed, and the main goal is the same - to stay in the ring as long as possible, defeat everyone and become a champion. Moreover, no one has yet been able to hold this title for a long time, because every time more and more new fighters enter the site.

item.title: Stickman 4 Archer
item.description: During the game Stickmen at War, you have to study all the weaknesses of your enemies in order to destroy them as soon as possible. Capture the surrounding lands to be able to unlock new units. At each stage, it is necessary to destroy the statue-symbol of the enemy and repel all enemy attacks. After successfully completing the level, you will receive 2 points for upgrading your own troops.

item.title: Stickman Army The Defenders
item.description: In order to play Prison Escape strategy games, you need to have a good reaction and the ability to quickly navigate in an unfamiliar room. Your task is to help the character leave the confined space and go free. In addition to the policemen guarding the building, there are many traps on the way to release, so try to act carefully and thoughtfully.

item.title: Stickman Fighter Epic Battles
item.description: Great fights are held in the backyard of the virtual bar. You can take part in them and earn some money. Your character is well trained and quite fluent in boxing techniques. But the fights are coming without restrictions and rules, you can fight both with your hands and with your feet. Try your best to win.

item.title: Stickman Fugitive
item.description: In this game, the view is from above, and the creators didnât bother much about how the characters look. But all the shortcomings are compensated by brutal bloody skirmishes and a chic arsenal of weapons. Of course, he is not immediately available to the main character. First you have to run with a gun. Other weapons either drop from enemies, or can be bought right in the process of passing.

item.title: Stickman Jigsaw
item.description: The famous cartoon donutsaurus goes hunting for his favorite sweets. Help the funny creature get to the treat. Carefully inspect the location he got to and find the perfect path, overcoming which the hero of the game will be happy to have a bite of a delicious sugar-coated donut.

item.title: Stickman Sniper Tap To Kill
item.description: A new game about black and white men. First surprise: if you get hurt, try to approach the nurse (at the beginning of the game she is lying on the bed in a red dress). Or just come along - you’ll like it. When you need to shoot - press the spacebar to switch to combat mode and back. Also, with a gun, it is much more productive to talk to the characters.

item.title: Stickman Vector
item.description: Vinnie and his team have come into conflict with a very vindictive mafia clan. The purpose of the mission is to track down the culprit of their misadventures and deal with him once and for all. But something did not go as planned, and now we have to make decisions based on the current situation. The game perfectly combines elements of sniper battles, hand-to-hand martial arts and intense chases.

item.title: Street Fight
item.description: Dozens of characters are offered to you to choose from to participate in the fighting tournament. While you go through levels of varying difficulty, previously hidden fighters will open. They differ from each other in speed, strength, an arsenal of specific techniques and skills. The game allows you to choose different modes, each of which has its own rules.

item.title: Street Fight King Of The Gang
item.description: The game gives the opportunity to participate in the battle as one or a pair of players. In it, 8 characters are waiting for you, ready to fight for victory in the ring of the prestigious championship, using super blows and their various combinations. Fight in different modes - quick, practice and challenge, against the clock, or a certain number of rounds. Two players can play on the same keyboard.

item.title: Street Skater
item.description: Load the gifts into the truck and drive on the slippery snowy tracks of the Racing game for kids 4 5 years old. At New Year and Christmas, everyone is looking forward to surprises and new holiday experiences. Much depends on Santa Claus. He needs to quickly deliver all the gifts for the holiday so that the celebration comes true and everyone is satisfied. Help Santa take the right number of guests to their destination in this exciting online racing game.

item.title: Subway Surf Halloween
item.description: While playing Subway Surf, the boy lost his beloved puppy, is terribly worried about the fate of his little pet and goes in search of him. You have to help the kid run through the streets of the town where he lives and try to find the dog. You need to play carefully, because a huge number of obstacles and dangers await him on the road, pedestrians, builders, open sewer manholes and open hydrants block your path.

item.title: Summer Lake Fishing
item.description: Tom is very fond of fresh fish, but first you still need to catch it. He had to take a fishing rod in his paws and go fishing. You need to help hungry Tom catch as many fish as possible. The game has a huge number of hints, and if you follow all the instructions, you will be able to provide the cat with food for a long time.

item.title: Sumo Party
item.description: You will control a small robot traveling through different worlds. It is also possible to fight other players in a destructible arena. In case of defeat, you can always repair your character by collecting his spare parts from the location. At the end of each level, you will be upgraded by the main character and more powerful weapons for him.

item.title: Super Alfonso
item.description: Manage Mario this time will not have to. This rogue dug up an ownerless piece of gold somewhere and is now dragging it to a pawnshop. But the path is full of traps. Your task is to provide him with a safe path to the pawnshop using the correct placement of blocks. It is not always possible to do this the first time, but if you try, Mario will reach the collection point of precious metals alive.

item.title: Super Chick Duck
item.description: Try to turn cute ducklings into world running champions. Make sure they get the right nutrition and exercise so that they can take first place in the duck race. And then, if you have enough patience and assertiveness, there is an opportunity to compete with a fat chicken already in the professional league.

item.title: Super Happy Kitty
item.description: After starting the Animal Doctor game, you will see the cat Angela, who was rollerblading and survived a dangerous fall. Kitty has received many injuries, serious and not so much, so it’s time to give her medical attention. In the game for girls, you will need to use the given tools correctly.

item.title: Super Mario Run
item.description: Mario again goes in search of adventure. Locations are filled with enemies, and they must be avoided or destroyed. Collect coins and try not to fall into the bottomless abysses that come across here at almost every step. To control you will need the arrow keys and Spacebar.

item.title: Super Mario Rush
item.description: The jungle is full of dangers. Killer turtles, cannibal bunches, brain-biting woodpeckers scurry about everywhere, and there are enough predatory plants. But Mario is not afraid of this. Especially if you manage it. Collect bananas and various tropical fruits. Monsters can be jumped over or trampled. To go to the next level, you need a portal to appear. It will appear when you collect the required amount of fruit.

item.title: Super Mario Rush 2
item.description: The Mario 3 game, with all its simplicity, can provide you with many pleasant minutes. The gameplay is simple: the main character goes forward through the location, collects money and stomps the monsters. And so from level to level. At the beginning of each level, a task is given. For example, collect a certain number of coins or kill a monster. Only when this condition is met, you can go to the next stage, reaching the blue flag.

item.title: Super Raccoon World
item.description: An interesting children’s game 3 5 years old offers you to solve exciting puzzles related to determining the heaviest or, conversely, the lightest object from those offered in the conditions. Immediately after launch, the scales will appear on the screen, on the cups of which the things being compared are located. At the top of the screen, a task is displayed that needs to be completed by pointing the cursor at the correct item.

item.title: Super Robo Fighter 2
item.description: Games for two Shooting robots offer you to control two bots of various modifications, which must complete an urgent task. They need to find the hatch through which the exit from the galactic station is carried out. The game is designed for 2 people, so you can invite a friend. Get ready for some serious challenges.

item.title: Super Robo Fighter 3
item.description: If you like to tinker with constructors, assembling robots with your own hands, then Autobots 2 games are what you need. So, in front of you is a box with a disassembled transformer. Try to assemble it entirely from individual parts. A translucent image of an Autobot robot acts as an instruction - just take it and put the fragment in its place. You use parts from one board - you get the next one.

item.title: Super Rocket
item.description: While playing Rocket to Space you have to learn to think quickly and logically. To train this valuable quality, fifteen stages are given. They get progressively more difficult. The essence, by and large, is very simple. There is a rocket at the starting point. And there is a finish line. The spacecraft must get to it using intermediate stops - cubes. For maximum credit on points, you need to do everything in the minimum time.

item.title: Superhero Pregnant Emergency
item.description: During the game Give birth to children you have to become an obstetrician of a charming princess. Not afraid? Then go ahead! You will end up in a hospital where the heroine of the game is almost ready to become a mother. All the necessary medical instruments have already been prepared on the screen to help the baby be born. Start the operation, throwing all the bad thoughts out of your head.

item.title: Superman Puzzle Challenge
item.description: In this game you have to play on behalf of superman. The task is to fly around the city, collecting bonus items. From time to time you will meet enemies, and you need to fight them, because Superman was created for this. The top of the screen displays all the important information that can help you in the game.

item.title: Swan Puzzle Challenge
item.description: All jigsaw puzzle lovers will love this simple but interesting game. It is necessary to assemble a full-fledged image from a large number of pieces. To do this, move the elements to the appropriate places and connect them in the correct order. As a result, you will get a bright and pretty picture.

item.title: Sweet Candy
item.description: During the game for children 4 years old Balls, your child will be able to feel like a bully. After all, only hooligans burst flying balls from spitting tubes. In more detail, everything looks like this: the main character must spit pieces of newspaper through a tube folded from paper and knock down as many balls as possible. The goal is to Crazy Games the maximum number of points.

item.title: Sweet Puzzle Time
item.description: Chica the hen and her friends had a big celebration on the occasion of Mr. C’s birthday. During the celebration, the guests managed to break all the paintings in the house. Help the hostess fold the pieces correctly and glue the pictures together. Chika will be grateful for your help and will return all the images to their places with great pleasure.

item.title: Sweet Tooth Rush
item.description: Funny toy. From the name it may seem that it has something to do with the cartoon about training the dragon. But it is not so. The essence of the game is as follows. Viking (that is, you) gets the task to run a certain distance. He will move on his own. Your task is to remove obstacles and collect coins. If the character hesitates, then the dragon will devour him.

item.title: Tabby Island
item.description: Animals Match 3 game invites you to go to the world of Wubbis - funny and very curious insects. So this time, shaggy balls managed to get into a huge press. Use your magic cannon to try to free all the wubbis from the trap for free before the huge top plate crushes the unfortunate babies. Collect chains of three or more balls and release them. Thanks to your help, all the cute shaggy babies will definitely get out of the dangerous trap and go in search of new adventures.

item.title: Talking Tom Piano Time
item.description: The process of making music will turn you into a real composer. In it, you can invent your own melodies, which will be immediately performed by a team of professional musicians. On the screen you will see a trinity of great guys who know a lot about quality music. Two guitarists and a drummer will help you deal with the creation of compositions. Above the group there is a special field where you need to drive in digital values ââthat will tell the game characters what exactly needs to be done at the moment.

item.title: Tank Battle: War Commander
item.description: Your task in this game is to protect the territory from enemies by all available means. Arrange your units so as not to let the enemy break through the defense. As you accumulate points awarded for each successful operation, you can purchase additional weapons and use them to strengthen your positions.

item.title: Tanks Master
item.description: Thanks to this game, you find yourself in the unique times of the appearance of the first tanks as a new type of weapon. Then these monsters looked completely different from what they are today, they had a steam engine, weak weapons and thin armor. You have to show design skills, upgrade your combat vehicle and defeat all enemies. Thus, you will prove the viability of this type of technology.

item.title: Tap For Money Restaurant
item.description: This exciting game is reminiscent of the board Monopoly. On the screen you will see a field marked into cells. Press the button, which acts as a cube, and move to the appropriate number of cells. Acquire firms, make bank deposits, play casinos. Your goal is to get rich and deprive your rivals of their income.

item.title: Tap Tap Parking
item.description: It is not often that you get a chance to be the captain of a comfortable yacht for at least a short time. This game will give you that opportunity. The task is to park the ship in the allotted place. This must be done with all caution so as not to drown the boat. To control, use the arrow keys and carefully look around.

item.title: Tap The Zombies
item.description: The game Mutants is not distinguished by any advanced plot. But in it you can let off steam after a hard day. View from above. The adventure begins in the store, but you still won’t be able to buy new weapons, because they are not available by level. However, you can take an additional grenade by spending all the money at once. Next, you will find yourself in a room, go through a short training and start repelling mutant attacks.

item.title: Tayler Schwift Vs Khanye East Parody Bat
item.description: Help the stars of the music world perform new compositions. To do this, simply click on the indicated arrow buttons. You should not make a mistake, because three mistakes will definitely lead to a loss. Gradually, the game becomes more difficult, and you need to react as quickly as possible to what is happening on the screen.

item.title: Teddy Bear Puzzle
item.description: Children’s educational game is aimed at training mathematical thinking. You need to play it together, each participant controls an alien on a flying saucer. A mathematical example is displayed on the screen, and you need to fly to the answer number as quickly as possible, ahead of your opponent. Fuel is limited!

item.title: Temple Quest
item.description: The Egyptian pyramids are full of mysteries and, one must understand, treasures that are guarded by dead pharaohs and their numerous servants, who, as you know, were buried with their owners and often alive. In this bright game, by the way, made in 3D, you have to control (rear and top view from a third person) either an explorer or a tomb robber who is running away from mummies.

item.title: The Day Before Elsa Wedding
item.description: The lovers are going to the wedding ceremony, and you need to think over the most suitable outfits for them. Pick up a suit for the groom and a dress for the bride, not forgetting about various little things. The finished image of happy newlyweds can be saved to a computer or printed.

item.title: The Dino King
item.description: The Dino World game is designed for younger gamers, but it will also be interesting for those who are older. The main characters here are dinosaur friends. One of them is large, and the second is small, in connection with which he loves to ride on a friend. From time to time they have to overcome obstacles. Where the big man cannot pass, the small lizard will pass and open the way.

item.title: The Immersion
item.description: The Submarine Simulator game will take you to the ocean depths that you need to explore. First, create a suitable transport for yourself, using the available money to purchase the necessary parts. After you finish your work, set sail. The game about submarines will be very interesting!

item.title: The Impossible Dash
item.description: The popular online platformer “Incredible Geometry Dash” is available to play for free. But do you have enough patience and enough direct hands? Start playing and test yourself. The character you control looks like a cube with a mouth and eyes. He slides from one part of the screen to another, and you have to save this mindless creature from collisions with various obstacles. Just click the left mouse button to make the hero jump at the right moment.

item.title: The Smurfs Counting Game
item.description: The Smurfs game will allow you to participate in exciting bike races. This vehicle is safer than motorcycles or cars, which, of course, is a plus. But not everything is as simple as it might seem at first glance. First impressions are often deceiving. There are also exceptions to the general rule. And this game is one of them. Your task, controlling a smurf, is to get to the finish line as soon as possible, bypassing all the obstacles in the process of passing the game.

item.title: Tiny Man And Red Bat
item.description: During the game for children 8 9 years old you will need to create delicious and beautiful ice cream. For this, everything you need is prepared here. You should start by choosing a waffle cup in which you want to place the ice cream chosen for children. Next comes the turn of fillers and decorative elements. There are a huge number of them here. You can use any topping, sprinkles, berries and other nice additions for a cold treat.

item.title: Tom And Jerry Mouse Maze
item.description: The heroine of the game went to the far side of the field, but accidentally scattered gardening supplies all over the garden. Help the muddler: get on your bike and go searching, find all the scattered things in the labyrinths of the homestead and deliver them to the girl. The baby will be very grateful to you for your help.

item.title: Tom And Jerry Run
item.description: Catcher Tom and Jerry

item.title: Tom Angela Kissing
item.description: In this game you have to help Tom and Angela kiss. A cat and a cat in love really want to pay attention to each other, but no one should see their kisses. Therefore, as soon as there is a danger of being noticed, it is necessary to immediately stop the exciting process. The progress of passing the level is displayed on the scale at the top of the screen.

item.title: Tomb Temple Run
item.description: Some crazy Viking will run and collect coins on the go in this game. Judging by the color of the body, completely frostbitten. Even when it crashes into an obstacle, it shatters into pieces, like ice. For the collected coins, buy all sorts of stray and upgrade opportunities. The controls are simple, side view of the character. You can take turns playing with your friends.

item.title: Toon Halloween Jigsaw
item.description: All fans of the popular animated series “Danny Phantom” will enjoy playing Solve in puzzles. The insidious Vlad Plasmius found a spell in one of the ancient magical artifacts, with the help of which he enclosed Denny’s family and his friends in a photograph, and then tore it into many pieces. We need to fix the situation. Collecting plasma means correctly connecting pieces with the image of cartoon characters to each other and, thanks to this, to break the monstrous spell.

item.title: Tower Defense D
item.description: You can start a new game or choose an old save if you have one. You can skip the long introduction, it’s still in English. Then, after some preparations, you can finally start playing. Its essence is reduced to the defense of your castle from enemies. The defense must smoothly turn into an attack, because the flow of enemies is endless. The purpose of the attack: destroy the enemy castle.

item.title: Tower Vs Tower
item.description: Airplanes for two game invites you to conquer the airspace. There are a huge number of levels, each of which has a specific task waiting for you. For example, you will need to fly through hoops or destroy targets. After each level, it is possible to upgrade the aircraft.

item.title: Toys Mahjong Connect
item.description: Mahjong connect game is one of the variants of the well-known oriental logic puzzle. Many, for sure, have seen it on their computers in the standard sets of entertainment applications of the operating system. But in this case, there are a number of differences.

item.title: Tractor Farming Simulator
item.description: According to the terms of Tractors 2, you need to tow a broken car and simply deliver it to the garage, which is located nearby. First, back up a little to hook the car with a cable. Then slowly hit the road, because you need to bring your cargo safe and sound. Therefore, do not accelerate and carefully overcome obstacles.

item.title: Traffic Rescue
item.description: In this game you will drive an ambulance. An urgent challenge awaits you, and you need to deftly overcome obstacles to get to the patient as soon as possible. Then turn around and take him to the hospital, carefully moving over bumps and potholes. Calls come from all over the city, but your goal is to deliver all the victims to the hospital.

item.title: Traffic Run
item.description: Beautiful toy with beautiful cars. By tradition, you can only choose one right away, but look at other options to know what to strive for. Your task is simple to disgrace: rush along the highway at top speed, perform risky overtaking and earn points. The first collision leads to the end of the level. The goal is to go more.

item.title: Transformers Super Mini-Con Striker
item.description: You would think that the Autobots have missions that are not important to anyone! So this time the importance of the mission just rolls over, as well as the number of enemies. Choose your robot at the very beginning of the game and start saving the world. But first, you should look into the control section and remember the necessary buttons. What’s annoying about this game is all the introductory cutscenes.

item.title: Transformers: Energon Rally
item.description: The Autobots rush to help, but the main thing is that the gasoline does not run out on the way. You can take part in a merciless battle with the Decepticons, of course, if you break through the jungle of instructions and other obstacles. Use the weapons of Bumble BI to stop the flow of enemy robots. Place mines, automatic turrets and crush them with your feet.

item.title: Treasure Hunt
item.description: Wonders in a row game invites you to go in search of the treasures of ancient Atlantis. At each stage of the search, you need to get a piece of the map from the ancient mosaic, which indicates the place where the fabulous treasures are stored. Try to lower the artifact to the bottom of the playing field, removing chains of puzzle pieces with the same patterns.

item.title: Treasure Island
item.description: The famous traveler Phyllias Fog goes on a trip around the world and you have to help him go around the whole Earth in 80 days. Every day you have to get for your new friend the things he needs on the way. Collect gems in chains and get parts of the items Phyllias needs.

item.title: Trolls: KÃ¤ferflug
item.description: There’s an air show in a small town and you’ve been invited to take part in an airplane race. Choose one of the characters in the game and go to the runway. You need to win three championship races and thanks to this, get the title of king of the sky before the next competition.

item.title: Tuk Tuk Crazy Driver
item.description: An explosion occurred at a chemical plant somewhere in the interior of Canada, and most of the population of this area turned into zombies. Help three brave friends escape from this nightmare. Control the actions of the team and the car on which they move. Don’t forget to take breaks and explore the abandoned buildings. There you can find food, weapons and fuel for your car.

item.title: Unblock That
item.description: Intellectual games for children 8 years old will introduce you to a little penguin who needs to get to the other side of the pond. And you need to build a bridge for him from ice blocks of various shapes. Think about exactly how they should be located so that the penguin can successfully cross to the opposite shore.

item.title: Under The Sea
item.description: This toy will help develop your mindfulness and memory. She offers to find pairs of identical cards in a deck laid out on the playing field. Turning over the cards with pictures in pairs, memorize their location and try to open the same ones. The game ends only when all pairs have been found.

item.title: Untamed
item.description: Terrorists have infiltrated the White House. President Bush was under threat - the bandits got to the Oval Office. But Bush is a good guy: he takes out a rifle and starts shooting back. Your task is to help the head of state deal with the attackers. Don’t forget to dodge shots and reload the magazine.

item.title: Valentine Pets Coloring Book
item.description: Do you like to draw? Then this game is made especially for you. Here you will find black and white pictures related to the theme of love. Choose any image and then start creating. You have many different felt-tip pens at your disposal, pick up the one you like and click on the part you want to color.

item.title: Valentines Hidden Harts
item.description: Chicky’s girlfriend, a cheerful cow, invites you to take part in her new game. The rules are very simple: you need to Crazy Games as many points as you can for capturing hearts. Try not to miss a single heart and don’t forget to catch bonus icons that will help you in the game.

item.title: Valet Parking
item.description: Although you drive a limousine, this does not mean that you can automatically park anywhere and any way you like - there are cars and cooler ones. So, don’t ooh, don’t ah, but turn the steering wheel and put this monster in its place. At the next levels, you will have to park other cars, and each time in a different way. Each stage can be replayed, bringing to perfection.

item.title: Valiant Knight
item.description: Those who are going to play the Wars of Thrones online should know that the toy for the film of the same name has a very mediocre relationship. But that doesn’t mean she’s bad. On the contrary, before you is an excellent example of a logical turn-based strategy, not much inferior to chess. The game of the War of Thrones takes place in the constant battles of your chosen character and various mythical monsters.

item.title: Vampires and Garlic
item.description: During a very funny game Vampires bite girls, you have to play the role of a bloodsucker (sorry for the rude word, but you should call a spade a spade). At each stage, the goal is the same - to get to the sleeping girl, climb on her and drink warm blood. However, not all so simple. On the way of the protagonist there are various obstacles that can be overcome using vampire magic.

item.title: Vex 3
item.description: A toy about a little man, whose face no one will ever see, because he does not exist at all, and the little man himself looks like someone’s shadow. However, he wants to run forward with the standard controls and overcome obstacles with parkour moves. You simply have to help him with this. By the way, if you wish, you can design levels yourself.

item.title: Vex 4
item.description: Terrorists have captured a desert island with a military laboratory, and you need to quickly neutralize the bandits. By helicopter you are delivered to the thick of things. Pick up a laser gun and get ready for a brutal fight. But try not to reveal your presence on the island for a longer time. If an enemy sees you, eliminate him immediately.

item.title: Virus
item.description: Today you have to plunge into the microcosm and control the virus that lives in human blood. Your task is to infect red blood cells. Later you will receive evolution points with which you can multiply. But you should be wary of white blood cells and antibiotics. They have strong counteracting properties and can destroy your ward.

item.title: Vloggers Life Tycoon
item.description: The game creation simulator invites you to turn into the owner of a huge corporation. The company is engaged in the development of computer entertainment, and you need to establish its internal activities in order to earn money and invest in business development. In front of you is an office with computers for which you need to seat workers. After that, it remains to give them a task, indicating in detail what kind of game you want to receive this time.

item.title: Warrior And Coins
item.description: In this game you will become a participant in a bloody battle with terrible zombies. We have to defend a small tower, which has two exits and a machine-gun nest on the roof, but there are no cartridges. They are to be dropped by parachute shortly. In the meantime, shoot back with a shotgun and try not to let the monsters close to the tower.

item.title: Wars Of Worlds
item.description: Clicking on the “how to play” button is probably not worth it. Anyway, after downloading, you will be taken to a page with an English-language instruction. Better to spend some time and figure it out yourself. Games such as Strategy for the development of civilization are intuitive for every gamer. The process is quite simple in itself: guard your home and try to destroy the enemy’s. To do this, you need to build defensive fortifications and call different units.

item.title: Watermelon Arrow Scatter
item.description: Find a few differences between the two images dedicated to the noble robber Robin Hood. At first glance, the pictures seem the same, but in fact, some details on them are clearly different. They need to be found by carefully examining the screen. For each correct answer you are entitled to 30 points, for a mistake 5 points are deducted.

item.title: Webimon
item.description: Hamster is a small animal. But he still needs a lot of attention. You can verify this by the example of the character of the game. He has a whole bunch of needs, which are displayed on the panel at the bottom of the screen. Near each of them there is an indicator strip. Don’t let it drop to zero. The instructions are clear and without translation, if you think a little.

item.title: Wedding Planner
item.description: The girl is about to get married, which means that you need to come up with a great outfit for her. By launching this game, you will see a large number of chic dresses, as well as all those little things, without which the wedding image will be incomplete. And when you click on the âHintâ button, ready-made options for holiday sets will open.

item.title: Wedding Preps
item.description: The heroine of the game is preparing for her own wedding. Naturally, she wants to look really chic on such an important holiday. Therefore, you need to help the bride to dress up. Choose a beautiful dress, shoes, jewelry, veil. Do not forget about the wedding bouquet, it is an essential attribute of the image.

item.title: Wheelie Cross
item.description: Motocross fans will love the Extreme Motorcycle Racing game. You have to measure your strength in a racing duel with one of the world’s leading motocrossers. On the five most difficult tracks, you must demonstrate your skills in driving a bike and get ahead of your competitor. The original design and sound design will allow you to enjoy the atmosphere of a real extreme race.

item.title: Wheels On The Bus
item.description: Deer, bear, penguin and other animals decided to record their own melody. You need to help them in this exciting business. Start recording and click on any character whose voice you want to add. After you finish creating a composition, you can listen to it. Create different options.

item.title: Wheely 2
item.description: The game Car Willie 2 invites you to join the famous little car in pursuit of his beloved.

item.title: Wheely 3
item.description: The character of the game Red Car Willy decided to prove that even a small subcompact car is able to compete in the royal races, and for this he went to the largest racing track in the magical world. Help the kid overcome all the obstacles, take part in the championship race and get a huge car racing champion cup. Willy will be grateful to you for the service rendered and will definitely invite you to the celebrations dedicated to his brilliant victory and the realization of the dream of every miniature car.

item.title: Wheely 4 Time Travel
item.description: While playing Wheely’s Car 4, you meet again with a restless little car who loves adventure. This time he went on a journey through the distant past. You have to help the kid overcome all the obstacles on the way and return to his own time.

item.title: Wheely 5 Armageddon
item.description: Willie’s Car 5 - Armageddon

item.title: Wheely 6 Fairytale
item.description: Walking through the streets of the city, Willy saw the most beautiful car in the world. He fell in love with the beauty at first sight, and she reciprocated. Help the hero of the game to wrest his beloved from the clutches of an insidious truck, which decided to separate the lovers and take Willy’s bride to another city.

item.title: Wheely 7 Detective
item.description: The head of a criminal organization nicknamed Royce seized all the fuel supplies in the city of funny cars. A huge metropolis is threatened with famine, only Willy’s little car and you can save civilians. Go in search of the insidious bandit and try to return the fuel to all gas stations in the metropolis as soon as possible.

item.title: Wheely 8 Aliens
item.description: The game Car Willie 1 takes you to the fantastic world of cars. It is there that you will meet its charming main character. He worked for a very long time in one of the showrooms and was terribly tired of such a pastime. In short moments of rest, baby Willy watched 1 sports channel, and he especially liked to watch car races.

item.title: Where`s My Avocado Draw Lines
item.description: You will definitely enjoy the game in which you have to color funny vegetables. So far, only black outlines are visible on a piece of paper, and in order for the picture to become color, you will have to show all your creative abilities. On the left and right side of the screen you will see circles with paints. Take a virtual brush with the mouse and start creating.

item.title: Whose House
item.description: A game of logic and thinking for children offers you to solve incredibly exciting puzzles in the company of funny live balls. They need to collect their cubs home, and for this, a large ball must touch all the babies of the same color. Choose the most suitable place to launch the balls and start the gameplay.

item.title: Wild Memory
item.description: This game will help the child in the development of spatial thinking and memory. On a small screen, you will be given some geometric shapes and given a few seconds to memorize them. Then on the board you must repeat their exact outlines and location in relation to the axes. You can draw with the mouse.

item.title: Winter Jigsaw Time
item.description: Educational for children

item.title: Winter Mahjong
item.description: From the very first seconds, the game New Year’s Mahjong Connect Pairs cheers you up with a picture on the main page, as well as cheerful music. Jazz, by the way, which, in general, is very rare in computer toys. The second pleasant surprise is the Russian-language interface and menu. Another language can be selected from two dozen options. Gamers are offered a simplified, so to speak, children’s version of the Mahjong game.

item.title: Winter Soccer
item.description: In this football confrontation, you are given the choice of championship mode, where you need to go through the entire standings, or a single match against an opponent. There is a training mode that will help novice gamers get comfortable with the controls. Crazy Games as many balls as possible to the opponent and try not to miss a goal in your own net.

item.title: Woodventure Mahjong Connect
item.description: Don’t be fooled by the romantic pink ambiance of this unusual puzzle. You will have to move your brains in it no less actively than when unfolding the classic mahjong. And the very principle of the game has not changed: look for identical paired fragments on the screen and click on them with the mouse, removing them from the field. If you do everything right, you can clear the entire screen.

item.title: Word Search
item.description: Play an exciting game with ponies and train your memory. On the screen you will see four pictures of cute little horses. Your task is to memorize the order in which the pictures are highlighted and reproduce it by clicking on the right ponies. If you click in the wrong place, you lose.

item.title: World War Pilot
item.description: The Fighter War game is an excellent simulator for managing a modern combat vehicle. Rather, sit at the helm of the aircraft and complete a series of training tasks. Only after that the command will entrust you with the first independent mission. Fly to the indicated square, find the target and destroy it with the fire of your cannons.

item.title: X-Trial Racing Mountain Adventure
item.description: There is nothing more pleasant than riding a motorcycle through the forest in warm weather. Race your bike along the mountain trails performing spectacular somersaults. Enjoy driving on different types of terrain, show off your skills behind the wheel of this nimble vehicle. Try to complete all the pirouettes to get the maximum experience and don’t be lazy to collect fuel along the way.

item.title: Xmas Magic Tiles
item.description: Tom and Angela decided to have a great disco. Help them record cool musical compositions. To do this, press any button on the DJ setup controlled by the cat Tom. To record a melody, you must click on the microphone icon. Three musical options are available for saving.

item.title: Yellow Ball Adventure
item.description: The process of playing Balls walker includes the passage of a huge number of levels, each of which is an original location. Your task is to control the blue ball and help it get to the star sign. Try to collect bonus balls along the way.

item.title: Zombie Challenge
item.description: After launching a shooting game for boys for 8 years old, a gamer may be intimidated by a rather large menu and the need to make several choices before starting the gameplay. However, in the shooting game genre, games for boys can’t be too difficult to scare away the clientele. So, it won’t be hard to figure it out. As for the passage, you will find many levels and funny characters.

item.title: Zombie Defense
item.description: Zombie games against people is a hard action game where hundreds of monsters destroyed the city and all its careless inhabitants who were not lucky enough to be on the street. You are the owner of a small truck parking lot, which, unfortunately, is located next to a zombie-infested metropolis. All the surviving people gathered in this, the only safe place. It is quite difficult to play, because you will have to not only repel the attacks of monsters, but also build various fortifications and training bases for future fighters.

item.title: Zombie Drive
item.description: A terrible period has come for the city: zombies crawl out of the ground and attack people. But you will be saved by a powerful jeep, which will be provided by the game Crush Zombie 2. You need to move around the game locations on it and destroy the resurrected dead that come across on the way. You should also destroy cars, boxes and other objects on the road, for which you can get even more reward points.

item.title: Zombie Hunt
item.description: Legendary zombie hunter Shotgun embarks on a dangerous mission to test a new type of shotgun. Help the hero of the game complete the assigned mission. Try to destroy all the monsters on the locations. After each successful battle, you will have the opportunity to improve the characteristics of the Shotgun rifle.

item.title: Zombie Killer
item.description: In this game you have to help cute characters get on TV. The process consists of a large number of levels, and each presents an original task. Tie the characters to the ropes or, on the contrary, cut them so that the cuties end up on TV. Beware of traps and intrigues of enemies.

item.title: Zombie Target Shoot
item.description: The name of the game speaks for itself. Users need to fight off mutant attacks. Wave after wave. The character stands behind the barricade (side view) and has a pistol in his hands. The attackers must not be allowed to destroy the fortification. In addition to the pistol, there is also a super-weapon that can not always be used - it takes a long time to reload.

item.title: Zombies At The Beach
item.description: In this game you have to chase the policemen. You drive a cute Cadillac that can not only go fast, but also jump, do somersaults, and shoot rockets (although they still need to be picked up). From collisions, the car gradually breaks down, so you may not reach the finish line. Collect bonuses along the way.

item.title: Zombies Eat All
item.description: During the game Zombie mutants you will control an unknown hero who blocked the path of evil spirits. Initially, he was armed only with a revolver, which had to be reloaded frequently. However, from time to time, as monsters are destroyed, bonuses drop out. For example, huge shoes that you can drop on enemies and crush them.

item.title: Zoo Pinball
item.description: An unknown disease has turned all the inhabitants of the zoo into bloodthirsty monsters, and now only you can save the visitors. Hurry up and go to the store where you can buy everything you need to fight monsters, and then start treating animals. Try to hit the monsters as many times as possible with a weapon that shoots the medicines they need.

item.title: Zuma Blast
item.description: In this game, you enter the carousel of Match 3 games. Try to stop the snakes of balls that are trying to get to the holes in the center of the game screen. With the help of a cannon that shoots balls, collect chains of elements of the same color. Hurry up and destroy the snake as quickly as possible, because it is very fast approaching the hole.

item.title: Ð¡limb Rush
item.description: In this game you will control Dasha the traveler, who goes on a dangerous journey on her horse. You need to jump over obstacles, fly over chasms, and collect sweets. The accumulated sweets will help you in the future to acquire new horses and other items for the game.
